Sat Dec 22 2018 21:52:00 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Cheryl Harrison
Sat Dec 22 2018 21:52:00 GMT-0500 (EST).review: Wonderful rental !! Our whole family thoroughly enjoyed ourselves!! Thank you for suggesting this site!!

Fri Dec 21 2018 16:57:00 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Jessica Main-Clark
review: I was a monthly tenant here from May 2018 - Dec 2018 while completing my clinical internship at Ascension St. Joseph Hospital. Not being from the area I was very nervous about finding a nice place to stay and people that I could trust to take care of my needs while away from home. Perfect Landing came through big time! This house is newly remodeled and boasts plenty of features that I wish I had at home! Lake Huron is literally right outside
and the beach is across the street! This property is also just a few blocks away from the businesses downtown

as well as plenty of restaurants and the piers. I did have an issue with wasps in the summer but the issue was resolved within days due to professional management of the property. The back deck is also beautiful...watch for all of the butterflies
especially in the a.m. The only downside would be the train tracks located just past the back yard; even then
it's not too much of a bother. Overall
I could not recommend this property enough!

Thu Nov 08 2018 22:40:00 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Kendra Nicole
review: Words cannot do this beautiful house justice. We shared a lovely vacation with such dear family here and could not have enjoyed this home more. From making delicious meals in a well equipped kitchen
kayaking day and night
splashing around in the beautiful water

taking in the sun on the beautiful soft sand there is no better place in Michigan than to do it right here. You will feel so at home with the amazing nextdoor neighbors on each side. The sunrise and sunset are like something out of a painting. Can‚Äôt wait to be back here soon and taking in all the beauty that surrounds me at Rise and Shine!

Mon Nov 05 2018 11:36:00 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Bob Wenglikowski
Mon Nov 05 2018 11:36:00 GMT-0500 (EST).review: Four of us stayed there for the last couple years for a weekend in October then for deer season. Had the whole house to start with. Still have plenty of room for the four of us in the bungalow . Nice and clean. The new owner Todd was real nice to talk with. Staying again next year.

Mon Nov 05 2018 11:22:00 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Sherry Handley
review: Very pleasant and tidy
terrific beach. Would stay again.

Wed Oct 31 2018 14:23:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Linda Hutchison
Wed Oct 31 2018 14:23:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Loved my stay at Huron Winds!!!

Sun Oct 28 2018 20:22:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Anna Jane
review: This is the only place I would ever stay in Au Gres. I‚Äôve been all over the state of Michigan and seen most the lakes and this cottage on the beach made me completely fall head over heels for Lake Huron. Every morning seeing the sunrise I felt a spiritual connection to the beach
water
and sky all at once. Don‚Äôt even get me started with the moon on the water at night. I haven‚Äôt had a vacation this purely relaxing and simple in my life. We woke up and made meals
took naps
rode bikes around the town
kayaked every hour of day AND night
went to see Tawas and Au Gres
the iconic lighthouse by boat
and we were ALWAYS having a raging time living it up. So cozy
comfortable
and everything I was looking for this summer! Much needed and highly valued family time. Thank you
thank you
thank you!

Wed Oct 24 2018 20:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Laurie
review: Tawas is a great place for a weekend getaway. My girlfriends and I stayed at the Faith House and it was nicely tucked away at the end of the street for privacy. The cottage-style house was in great condition
nicely decorated
and had all of the amenities as if you were at home. It was clean and well stocked. We had a great campfire in the backyard and we were very comfortable all weekend. It is very close to shopping
which is also unique and fun! We are coming back in 2019!

Wed Oct 24 2018 11:31:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Becky Shrake
Wed Oct 24 2018 11:31:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: My daughters and grandchildren and I were there this past summer 2018. We had a great time! Had a few issues but resolved quickly. Kitchen well stocked with appliances we needed. Beach is great! Will come back to this house. Great location!

Wed Oct 24 2018 09:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jan DeMasellis
review: House was beautiful and well equipped. The yard and gazebo were enjoyed

and the beach was wonderful 
 Everyone had a great time.

Tue Oct 23 2018 18:11:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Deborah Crist
Tue Oct 23 2018 18:11:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Great view from front door. Steps to the water. Sofa bed pretty bad. Found a board in storage to put under mattress. Made it much better.

Tue Oct 23 2018 18:00:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rebecca C Gaumond
review: Wonderful cabin. Enjoyed its location and the yard
beach were wonderful. Loved the sun porch too.

Tue Oct 23 2018 17:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Bonnie Hemgesberg
Tue Oct 23 2018 17:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We have stayed here in 2017&2018 and absolutely love ‚ù§Ô∏è it! Our grandkids have sooo much fun they don‚Äôt want to leave. This year we sat at the table and painted rocks. Our grandson painted one for the owners thanking them for letting us stay at their home üè†. THANK YOU for opening up your home to our family! The Hemgesberg‚Äôs

Tue Oct 23 2018 17:52:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Gerre Johnson-Derus
Tue Oct 23 2018 17:52:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: The home and beach were great. Our ladies group enjoyed the home and there was plenty of room for everyone. The ouside gazebo with fire pit was a super added benefit. We plan to come back!

Tue Oct 23 2018 17:09:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Nikki Somers-Klanseck
review: Great place to stay! The location was perfect- near both Tawas and Oscoda. The sandy beach was beautiful and private. The cabin was very clean and spacious aside from the small bathroom. Only complaints would be that the futon wouldn't open (so we lost some sleeping space)
the television is quite small
and there's no wifi. Considering cell coverage is not great in this area
it would be SO much more convenient if they would add wifi. Really hoping this service is added...

Tue Oct 23 2018 15:59:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathleen McDonough
review: Nice
charming cottage close to everything and near the best beach around.

Tue Oct 23 2018 14:59:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Zeinab f
Tue Oct 23 2018 14:59:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Perfect landing you guys are the best ! Location and beach and next door neighbor Was awesome but owner needs too put some love into this home needs lots of repairs and updates ! If willing to sell we are interested can‚Äôt wait for our summer vacation 2019 !

Tue Oct 23 2018 14:07:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: karen madias
Tue Oct 23 2018 14:07:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: LOVE IT!!! Total relaxation and peaceful.

Tue Oct 23 2018 13:43:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Elaine
review: Nice place to accommodate us; however

the hot tub was very dirty and couldn't use it. Two staff members came out to look at it. One left and never returned. 
 The other looked at it and asked us to drain it and refill it. Didn't feel comfortable doing that. We locked the door. No wifi and kitchen stools/chairs were wobbly. Swing out by the river was not very safe.

Tue Oct 23 2018 13:23:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: MARY
Tue Oct 23 2018 13:23:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We had a wonderful time perfect for our family & the kids had a blast from dawn to dusk.

Tue Oct 23 2018 13:08:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Brant F
review: This house exceeded every expectation! The pictures do not do it justice
as it is far more beautiful in person. We stayed the second week of August and had the most wonderful time. There is plenty of room for 12 people
and the gas lit
enclosed gazebo is perfect for evening hours. The morning views of the sunrise across the water are amazing
and the beach has some of best
softest sand around. Just minutes from Au Gres grocery and restaurants make the location perfect for a family vacation. This is our new go to spot for the summer! <3 <3 <3

Mon Oct 08 2018 12:02:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Dave
review: Had a good stay
nice location. The major downsides were difficulty locating on GPS as well as several large spiders and cobwebs INSIDE the cottage. In all honesty
I really enjoyed the feel of the cottage
but it becomes aparant that cleanliness isn't the top priority when there were literally 10 ft cobwebs crossing the stairwell
big clumps on the curtains as well as the decorations in the bay window. I wish this review would allow me to post pictures
because I have a few! I feel a little ripped off when I paid $75 for a  cleaning fee  when I'm the one killing the spiders and removing their home from yours.

Wed Oct 03 2018 08:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Michelle
Wed Oct 03 2018 08:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Had a lovely time. Have been to the resort in the past in a different cabin. Would stay again. Very cozy. Never could connect to WI-FI though. Not sure that‚Äôs a bad thing. Newer upgraded TV was nice. Bought a fry pan and left it in the kitchen as there wasn‚Äôt one that we could find. The dishwasher worked fine and there were dishwasher tabs under the sink. A very relaxing and quite stay.

Mon Sep 24 2018 10:18:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Andrea Guerrini
Mon Sep 24 2018 10:18:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: A perfect location to stay for our family visit in East Tawas. Very comfortable home with everything we needed provided by the owner. Loved having the Lake and downtown area so close. We are looking forward to a return visit.

Mon Sep 17 2018 17:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mandy C.
Mon Sep 17 2018 17:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: I had stayed previously 3 years ago and loved it so I decided to stay there again this year. The view is absolutely amazing and it is very relaxing there!!! The house was clean when I got there and didn't have any issues. The only con was the full sized bed. My partner (who is extra tall) had some trouble finding a comfortable position. Everything else made up for that though.

Thu Sep 13 2018 16:46:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Paulette Lenk
review: 2018 is our third summer at Sutton's Sunrise/Sunset and as usual we had a great time with our family. My kids come along with the grandkids which range from 16 down to 8. It's a time to reconnect

tell family stories and just sit and watch the waves lap against the shore. The privacy of the location is the best part of the experience and what's not to like about watching shooting stars at night around a roaring campfire. Every day we are in the water unless there is a storm so bathing suits are our main attire. We cook all of our meals there except when we go to Tawas to get G's Pizza on Thursday night - it's tradition! We plan to return in August of 2019 to create more happy memories. Have you created family summer memories recently? It's time to check our Sutton's Sunrise/Sunset.

Wed Sep 12 2018 22:55:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Tanya
Wed Sep 12 2018 22:55:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Had a wonderful stay at this cabin. The backyard was so relaxing and the access to the beach was perfect. The cabin was like our home away from home. I‚Äôve already suggested this cabin/property management company to friends looking to get away for the weekend. Thanks again for letting me & my family enjoy your home.

Wed Sep 12 2018 13:31:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mari
review: Great location on the river. Hard to find a place that could fit 10 people at short notice. And it worked just fine for what we paid. It was clean
mostly. If there are just 2 or a few of you the upstairs is nicely decorated and has great windows. Don't use the sofa bed though. There is no mattress
just a folding sofa bed box spring. I think the mattress was downstairs in one of the bedrooms where we stayed. Speaking of which

we folded back the bed cover (in the bedroom by the entrance) to find soiled paper towels on the sheet. They did have plenty of sheets in a plastic tub though so we managed to find clean sheets. There was plenty of hot water

which is a huge plus since we had a formal affair to go to. Would have been nice if they had an iron. The kitchen worked well for breakfast. (There are 2 kitchens but we only used one) Don't count on using the spa
kind of gross. But overall it worked just fine.

Mon Sep 10 2018 19:42:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Renee
review: My boyfriend and I had a fun time here. We spent most of the weekend outside fishing and relaxing by the firepit at night. It's a great place to stay if you like to fish. We had to call Direct TV to get the cable working and there were very few channels to watch
couldn't watch a single football game. The beds and bathrooms could use some updating. Overall
I would recommend this cabin for a relaxing weekend getaway.

Mon Sep 10 2018 15:47:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Heather
review: Overall
we had a great time. However

there are a couple of things that were disappointing.
 The home had a STRONG mold and mildew odor. We almost left because my friend has allergies and it was pretty bad for her. After opening all of the windows
it did subside to a vague odor so we stayed
but she had to take allergy medicine the whole time. If a child had severe allergies
it would have been unlivable. Next
there was a note left by (I assume) the owner

that we could not use the fireplace. We were not advised of this before booking the property. It would have been nice to use it because it was quite chilly while we were there. I liked the home and would consider staying again if those issues were taken care of.

Mon Sep 10 2018 10:08:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jodie
review: Overall the cottage was great for the weekend. Very cute and met out ammenties for our stay. However

the pet hair that was lingering was overwhelming. I actually washed the sheets/bedding for the main bedroom as it was covered inside and out with cat or dog hair. It seemed that they had not been washed. All of the throw blankets and throw pillows in the cottage were covered with pet hair. If we had been allergic
this would defintely have been an unpleasant experience.
response: Thank you for your input

your feedback was very helpful to know what can be improved! We have an on call representative available 24/7 that you can contact with any occurences that take place such as the one you had. We would have definitely had someone come out to take care of this or assess the circumstance considering it's not a pet friendly property. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Wed Sep 05 2018 16:04:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Michelle & Pat Sayles
review: We had a wonderful Labor Day weekend get-away at this cute & cozy rental on Lake VanEttan! Hosts were so friendly

helpful and warm throughout our stay. Kitchen is well outfitted with all the conveniences of home. Sunsets were gorgeous and the big campfire pit made for a perfect way to end our day. Had a blast fishing right off the dock and enjoyed sitting by the lake. We DEFINITELY plan to return!!!

Wed Sep 05 2018 12:28:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Michelle Reeve
review: This is the 2nd time here
we enjoyed it so much last year and despite finances not being the best
we still chose to revisit due to how great it was last year. This place is super clean with all working appliances. The place is quiet and peaceful
though you will have the neighbors behind with dogs that are left out and bark non stop until they return. Other than that this place is a dream and with such a short distance to the beach

our 2 year old was able to walk there multiple times a day. While the beach is sandy the water each is a little rocky but makes for a good search for rock collectors or stone skippers. We are hoping to maybe visit again next year but perhaps when it is a little warmer with the water so we can swim a bit more.

Wed Sep 05 2018 10:06:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Susan Westerdale
review: We enjoyed our stay and the house was spotless and well eauipped. Unfortunately a bad storm came up two nights befor our departure and we lost power for two days. The rental agency graciously refunded that part of our payment without our asking
a real plus! Beautiful view of our favorite lake
would stay again.

Tue Sep 04 2018 20:17:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Pang
Tue Sep 04 2018 20:17:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: The house is very clean and spacious. We had a great time.

Tue Sep 04 2018 18:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Lywana Bourland
Tue Sep 04 2018 18:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Sweet little house. Other than a few minor hiccups it was a great location and loved the water view. Hopefully next time we can fish if time allows.

Tue Sep 04 2018 15:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Nick & Basia
review: This unit was very nice. The pictures must be old

because too our surprise it had new hard surface flooring throughout. Our family of 6 had a great time over the holiday. Beach is beautiful and private. 3 mile park is right next door. Pete's party store is steps away. 
 Fire pits and BBQ's are plentiful. There's nothing more relaxing then waking up to a sunrise over a beautiful beach right at your feet. 
 Thank you.

Tue Sep 04 2018 14:44:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sharlene Frizzell
Tue Sep 04 2018 14:44:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We were glad to find this rental after our previous rental was canceled three weeks before Labor Day. Loved the openness of the living room kitchen dining area. Loved the fire pit which was used night nightly and the wraparound deck. This rental had enough beds to accommodate six adults and two children and an infant. The fishing was great on Indian Lake and we even got to see a bald eagle. Would love to see a few updates and a few maintenance issues addressed but overall a great location close to Tawas City and our favorite party store/ice cream/pizza shop The Indian Lake Outpost. Many great family memories were made.

Tue Sep 04 2018 09:51:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jessica LeVesseur
review: Absolutely perfect! Clean
spacious
updated cottage! Never felt crowded even when the rain pushed the six of us inside for a couple hours. The beach area is gorgeous
clean soft sand and sandy bottom all the way out deep in the water! Fabulous property
we will definitely rent again!

Mon Sep 03 2018 09:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Beth A. Favors
Mon Sep 03 2018 09:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This is our 2nd to stay at the At Peace cabin for me and my son and just as we remembered from the summer of 2016 it was ao wonderful...even better this time since we were they able to stay almost a full week. The house is cozy and clean and you can walk to G's Pizza for carryout if you don't feel like cooking. Spent every day in the water...Lake Huron is so beautiful! The Sandy Beach and privacy is very nice! Great for small families or a couple. For some reason this year the foot washing bucket was gone so I went up to Big K and purchased 1 along with the full length mirror. I hope everyone enjoys those extra little amenities. We will be back... so many great memories for me and my son! Hope to come back again very soon!

Thu Aug 30 2018 14:26:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Linda Tortorice
Thu Aug 30 2018 14:26:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Cottage was clean and comfortable. Beds were comfortable and had adequate covers. Location was good. Appreciate towels and soaps provided as our stay was the minimum 3 nights. A good alternative to hotel or motel stays. Good first experience and would stay again when visiting in the area.

Thu Aug 30 2018 14:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Lind aTortorice
review: Cottage was clean

comfortable beds and seating. Good location for us. Nice alternative to staying at a hotel or motel. Towels & linens were supplied and had soap which was appreciated since our stay was the minimum 3 nights.

Wed Aug 29 2018 10:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Charlie
review: Great week. It was our first family reunion and everyone had a great time. Loved the spot along the water. Reminded everyone growing up on Lake Huron. The resort was a great meeting spot for everyone people loved the nostalgic cabin feeling. The main house was set up nice to cook and serve meals. the yard had enough room so all of us could reminisce and play corn hole. Down by the water was a nice place to hang out with a fire pit there and a deck to roast smores and watch stars. No complaints with anything. Everything with the vacation agency went smooth. I saw no reason why we wouldn't use the facility in the future. Yes a beach would be nice but we still went swimming
would be tough for little kids. Growing up on Lake Huron you know it changes. Nice being close to town.

Wed Aug 29 2018 09:00:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sarah Armstrong
review: We rented this cabin for 3 nights with 2 adults and 2 children and had just enough room to be cozy but still comfortable. The cabin is small so if you plan to spend a lot of time inside I'd suggest renting elsewhere but it was perfect for us: we wanted to be close enough to hear the water at night and walk out the door into the sand all day and that's exactly what you get staying in cabin 1 or 2. Fires at night were perfect on the beach in the provided fire ring and leave your sand toys

rafts and chairs at home as there a plenty there to borrow. This cabin is very quaint and not updated to newest amenities but fit us perfect for an unplugged weekend away at the beach. The Perfect Landing team provided great communication and responded to any concerns and questions we had quickly. We will definitely be back!

Wed Aug 29 2018 08:10:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Tina Meade
review: Beyond a relaxing getaway. Place was clean
beautiful
peaceful. View was just what the doctor ordered. I will be back next summer. Thanks again for a non-hassle transaction! ! Hated to leave.

Tue Aug 28 2018 18:27:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jennifer Gardner
review: We used to live on the north side of Tawas Point
and staying in this location was fantastic. It's so close to the state park
all the beaches and our favorite spots. Our dogs were able to stay here and they loved it
and the nearby pet beach. Our 3 year old had a blast
she loved the outdoor shower. The cottage was comfortable
and perfect for our 3 day get away. We had a great time
and would definitely come here again!

Mon Aug 27 2018 21:39:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: William Johnson
Mon Aug 27 2018 21:39:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review:
We had an awesome time at the cottage during our stay.
 The cabin is very stocked with most anything a person would need. Just bring your own food of choice and your clothes. Fully stocked Kitchen and 2 BBQ grills to choose from. There is a very nice fire pit in the back yard and plenty of lawn chairs for all to sit.
 There is a nice outdoor shower as well but one should spray it for spiders on the day you arrive if you would like to use it.
 It is located next to the state park and in a very quiet neighborhood. We never did locate the trail to the water however most of our time was spent at the Blues Festival that was in town and enjoying the great company with all of the family that showed up.
 I would definitely recommend this place and would come back here as well.
 
 Papa Bill & Kathy

Mon Aug 27 2018 16:41:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Veronica RIKER
Mon Aug 27 2018 16:41:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: The place was great a little older the stove was unhooked so it a little challenging to cook anything. But was clean property is beautiful.

Mon Aug 27 2018 14:31:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathy
review: Other than the uncomfortable beds
we ejoyed our stay at this cabin. The location was great
it was very clean and it included many great amenities.This cabin would be the perfet place to stay if it included wifi & more comfortable beds.

Mon Aug 27 2018 12:52:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: John & Dawn Berzsenyi
review: After beginning our experience with Surf Side #13

which was a complete mess. You worked out a stay in Surf Side Heights #2 for the same cost. The accommodations were terrific. The bedding was a bit musty but other than that our stay there was very nice. Everything was available for us including a beautiful view of lake Huron. Thank you for turning our unhappy start into a great three days!

Mon Aug 27 2018 12:24:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Carrie
review: Beautiful home with amazing views. Was disappointed because it said there was a coffee pot and there wasn‚Äôt
so we bought and left a small 5 cup pot. The kitchen isn‚Äôt very stocked with pots/pans if you plan on doing much cooking but everything was nice and clean. I would definitely recommend this rental.

Mon Aug 27 2018 11:11:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jennifer Wright
review: The house is beautiful
and the location is great! There was plenty of room for all 10 of us. The kitchen was well stocked with plenty of dishes and pots & pans.The beach is nice
but it was quite a walk uphill back to the house

and the acorns mixed in the sand hurt your feet if you didn‚Äôt wear your water shoes. The cleanliness was not what we are used to from Perfect Landings. There was dust and spiderwebs in most of the rooms
and it was pretty thick on the ceiling fans. The kitchen sink had some gunk we had to clean off before we could wash dishes. The finished basement was nice
but being a basement
it smelled quite musty
and set off the allergies of 2 guests who slept there. The dehumidifier was definitely needed
as it was emptied about 3 times a day. Overall
we had a great time and enjoyed our stay!!

Mon Aug 27 2018 10:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Laurelle Brennan
review: We stayed here for a summer weekend away. The location is very convenient for town and beach. Our dog had a great time on the beach. The condo is well equipped with the basic supplies

though I'm glad I brought my own bath soap because none was provided. Otherwise a comfortable unit. 
 The property was not ready at check in time
so we had to wait over an hour to unpack etc
but were able to sit on the patio until the unit was ready. The office also called us to inform us of the delay which was much appreciated.

Mon Aug 27 2018 10:48:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Judy Herman
Mon Aug 27 2018 10:48:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Great set up for all the people that came from all over the USA. I walked in and couldn‚Äôt believe how perfect it was for my family of older adults. Have a sister in law who has Parkinson‚Äôs and the entrance with no steps and s bathroom across from the bedroom was ideal for her. Everyone one in my family loved it. They all agreed it was our best reunion yet. The fact that we were all in one house together was what made it so great. A few things that weren‚Äôt anything critical but probably addressed in the future. The hot tub had no chlorine tablets and water was pretty disgusting after a few days. The windows in the kitchen up and down had no screens for ventilation and being the primary cook for a dozen people it was pretty hot but on the bright side I lost 5 lbs. so can‚Äôt complain about that. We loved the way it felt like our own home and it was so quiet at night we bought a blow up mattress because the sofa beds were the worst part of the whole experience but we worked it out. The best part was from the time I put my initial deposit down I had a wonderful experience with team@perfectlandingrentals and I will definitely contact them again when we have our next reunion in 4 years thank you for s wonderful 9 days

Mon Aug 27 2018 10:46:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Judy herman
Mon Aug 27 2018 10:46:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Great set up for all the people that came from all over the USA. I walked in and couldn‚Äôt believe how perfect it was for my family of older adults. Have a sister in law who has Parkinson‚Äôs and the entrance with no steps and s bathroom across from the bedroom was ideal for her. Everyone one in my family loved it. They all agreed it was our best reunion yet. The fact that we were all in one house together was what made it so great. A few things that weren‚Äôt anything critical but probably addressed in the future. The hot tub had no chlorine tablets and water was pretty disgusting after a few days. The best part was from the time I put my initial deposit down I had a wonderful experience with team@perfectlandingrentals and I will definitely contact them again when we have our next reunion in 4 years thank you for s wonderful 9 days

Sun Aug 26 2018 21:31:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rhonda Pobanz
review: I have been renting properties for years

and this was by far the best yet! The home is absolutely beautiful. The layout of the home was great. The ammenities inside and outside the home included everything you could think of (we definately overpacked üòÅ). The beach was fantastic
clean and in a very private setting. We hope to come back next year!

Fri Aug 24 2018 10:56:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Wedad
review: We rent from perfect landings every year and this by far was our worst experience. Let me first start with the good. The location was perfect
the view of the lake and the gorgeous sunrise in the morning was breathtaking. The neighbors were another plus
they were so nice and kind. The house was pretty stocked with the normal things we needed so that was appreciated. Now on to the bad

the house was dirty. The floors were full of sand and there were cobwebs everywhere. Spiders and flies and dirty everywhere. The grill was dirty and full of spiders so I would recommend hosing it down before using it. Make sure you bring your own towels too if you have a big family. Be careful because it says the place has a/c but it's not central air

there are 2 units in the bedrooms but not thruout the house. It also says 2 bathrooms but keep in mind only one of those has a shower. There were 6 of us so it was hard for everyone to shower after the beach. The house could also definitely use a nice good power wash on the outside. Decent for the price but we won't stay at this one again.
response: Thank you for your input
your feedback was very helpful to know what can be improved! Glad you could soak in the breathtaking view of Lake Huron and enjoy the beach. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Thu Aug 23 2018 10:19:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jane Sargent
review: There is a beautiful view from the deck of Grand View 2. The water was clear and fairly warm. However
the cabin itself seriously needs some updating. #2 looked to be the nicest one
but the carpets and the furniture were filthy. We had to put sheets and towels over the couch and bar stools so we could sit. The beds were very
very uncomfortable
old
and creaky. I also would not recommend the lake for children to swim. The beach and water were full of rocks
and the grass was loaded with goose droppings. In all fairness
we did not contact the office with our concerns
but they weren‚Äôt things their staff could fix in the moment anyway. We ended up leaving a day early.

Wed Aug 22 2018 16:40:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Bill
review: Everything you need to enjoy your stay. Lot's of little pan fish along with a lot of weed snags. Still
caught quite a few. Lot's of fishing holes around town. Neighbors were friendly
cabin was clean and comfy. We had a great time.

Wed Aug 22 2018 11:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Danielle Genz
review: Our vacation stay at the Bay House was fantastic! Our family owns a cabin close by
however

there are too many of us to stay in one location now! I would definitely rent the Bay House again in the future. The house comes equipped with everything needed to make your stay feel like you are at your own cabin. The location is the best part in my opinion! The town and pier are literally right down the street along with the park and the beach across the road. The mornings on the porch are the best as you can watch the town come alive. :) We ate at a couple of places
Tony's Tacos and The Lodge
and were very pleased with our meals. The nachos were huge at Tony's Tacos and the Italian sub at The Lodge was so good! We could not have asked for a better vacation in Tawas. Love from Idaho!

Wed Aug 22 2018 10:32:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Matthew Roman
review: This was our second time staying at the rental in two years. Really a good amount of space for such a small building and the location is great. Awesome beach
quiet

fairly private. I would visit again. I would suggest bringing your own pots and pans because the ones at the rental unit should be thrown away and not used. The teflon is flaking off and its not safe to cook on.

Tue Aug 21 2018 15:26:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Gayla Nader
review: We stayed at this property for a long weekend and it was wonderful. The house is spacious with plenty of room for our party of 9. The water is beautiful and we had our own large
private beach for the kids to play in right behind the house. There is a great firepit on the beach and plenty of seating
although we did bring our own chairs as well. There is a Rite-Aid right behind the house across the road

which is very convenient. The house feels very secluded and private from neighbors. The living room has 2 separate areas so the adults played cards on one side while the children watched a movie on the other - it was awesome. The beds were comfortable and clean. The kitchen was well-stocked and we had absolutely everything we needed to make and serve food and drinks. The back patio is fantastic and has a great round table with comfy chairs and an umbrella. We had such a wonderful time and we can't wait to book this place again.

Tue Aug 21 2018 07:46:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: charlie day
Tue Aug 21 2018 07:46:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: very roomy with easy access to beach

Mon Aug 20 2018 21:30:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jillian
review: Perfect location for a family with kids - close to beach with basketball courts
playscape
and pier. Coffee shop
beachside shops and ice cream all within walking. House fully furnished with all kitchen items.

Mon Aug 20 2018 21:28:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jennie Thorner
Mon Aug 20 2018 21:28:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: beautiful location . However the bathroom toilet is not level or flat on the floor it doesn't move but leans And the flooring behind the toilet had no subflooring under the linoleum so felt like you could fall through. Lots of spiders and cobwebs. Overall we had a great weekend.

Mon Aug 20 2018 21:18:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Tammy Patton
Mon Aug 20 2018 21:18:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We spent a 3 day weekend here. The home fit 6 of is perfectly. The area is relaxed and peaceful The house came with all needed supplies. We brought our own kayak and 6 person raft so we were able to enjoy the sandbar and the lake. The Sunset was beautiful. *The back outside lights did not work. We would definitely stay here again

Mon Aug 20 2018 19:52:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jenny carroll
review: This was our second year at this property. We love it. Large yard

and beach. 
 We have no complaints! There was 5 families with plenty of room. Beautiful views of Lake Huron.

Mon Aug 20 2018 16:37:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Zach
Mon Aug 20 2018 16:37:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Overall the experience was a good one the beach was great the location was good. The cabin was a little dated and needed some tlc but overall was clean and comfortable. Would stay again

Sun Aug 19 2018 15:00:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Zeinab Faraj
review: I‚Äôm a 12 year customer with perfectlanding and I love the staff and all the help they have gave me through out the years to find the perfect summer vacation rental. Black river beach was different this year for my family
it was a longer drive (gas $ ) closest decent store was family dollar

the same day we got there had to call about some things in the home were not working or broking so we don‚Äôt get charged a fee (water on floor in laundry room ). The home it self was very dusty & rooms had a musky spell (paid 100$ cleaning fee ) less stocked then the other homes I‚Äôve rented. The blue beach chairs in the photos not there we had to get our own. Lots of bugs in and out of the house

yes it was August but we go every year around the same time never had that issue so had to buy my own lawn bug spray it was that bad ! Someone watches the house for the owner got a phone call that we had to many people in the house ! All in all the lake was amazing ! The couple (neighbors )next door were very nice and very generous

let my kids use thier roll boat and kept an eye out when it wasnt safe for them to use it due to the big beautiful waves ! Would I rent it again yes but things need to be updated and fixed for the price I paid !

Sun Aug 19 2018 02:34:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Brian Landsperger
Sun Aug 19 2018 02:34:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: My family thoroughly enjoyed our time at the Lazy Dayz. It was clean and adequate for our large group. The beach was amazing and there was plenty of deck space and room around the fire pit!

Sat Aug 18 2018 19:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: doyle jackson
review: We really enjoyed it. Pleasant and peaceful
just a few feet from Lake Huron. Well furnished with really good appliances and cook ware and beds. Several vertical blinds missing. Locks and cranks on windows broken. Jaco was super nice.

Sat Aug 18 2018 14:01:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Brandy
Sat Aug 18 2018 14:01:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: What a lovely home! The babbling brook and the pond were wonderful to look at off the back deck. The home was very clean and had some great games to play. Very happy with our stay

Sat Aug 18 2018 13:46:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathleen McCarthy
review: The cottage was very nice and clean. We had a beautiful view of the lake. The tv wasn‚Äôt working when we were there. There was a phone message left in my home phone on Thursday saying someone from the cable company was going to be there but no one called me in my cell phone. No one from the cable company showed up. Also
the all the sinks
tub and toilet were very rust stained. I understand this happening but I have stayed at other cottages in the area that haven‚Äôt had this.

Sat Aug 18 2018 11:39:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mary Knight
Sat Aug 18 2018 11:39:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Have stayed here a number of times on our annual girl's trip to Oscoda. Everything has always been lovely right down to the weather. On our trip back downstate we decided absolutely hands down we will be back again next year!

Fri Aug 17 2018 20:50:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Janice DeMasellis
review: The house was beautiful
had everything we needed

Fri Aug 17 2018 12:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: KENNETH CHARLES ADKISSON
review: Excellent beachfront home

Thu Aug 16 2018 10:51:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Karla Campbell
review: Love that this place is pet friendly

but overall it‚Äôs right on the beach
our stay here was very nice.

Wed Aug 15 2018 20:13:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: John kulek
review: House was great

Tue Aug 14 2018 23:22:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Donald Springer
Tue Aug 14 2018 23:22:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: It was a great place just what we were looking for a lot to do and great for teenagers we will definitely try and come back again we miss it already

Tue Aug 14 2018 23:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Beatrice Miller
Tue Aug 14 2018 23:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: It was a great place just what we were looking for a lot to do and great for teenagers we will definitely try and come back again we miss it already

Tue Aug 14 2018 21:00:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Vermeesch Family
Tue Aug 14 2018 21:00:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This is a beautiful property with lots of space and a nice beach. It was a great stay and appreciated a swift response to a minor problem.

Tue Aug 14 2018 15:11:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rahnea I Heard
review: We always rent from Perfect Landing
and always a different place each time. This one was beautifully decorated
it has a beachy feel and you can tell the owners take pride in their house. It doesn't look like much on the outside
but the inside is amazing. We were delighted from the moment we opened the door...it has all the updates you would appreciate in a rental home (keurig coffee machine
dishwasher
etc.). The description talks about eventually having a beach area
but truly we were not disappointed. This house is down a quiet lane and then the house also sits back away from the road allowing some yard in front with a burn pit
and also a decent sized yard in the back with a burn pit
deck area with table/chairs
the area is surrounded by trees
and the most amazing view of a sunrise (as a photographer I truly appreciated the beauty from the moment you walk out the door)...we even had 3 deer by the back door on our last morning. Pros: quiet
nicely decorated
new updates
clean kitchen with all the necessities
stainless steel appliances
ceiling fans in the bedrooms
2 sets of patio doors allowing a wonderful breeze to flow
large bathroom with full shower (it does not mention this in their description)
kitchen table next to the kitchen sits 6
another table in the dining area sits 4
newer hardwood floors throughout
reclining loveseat
and lots of room for a large family to stay. Cons: the screen door on the patio will not close correctly and leaves a large gap at the top when closed
the inside patio door is a struggle to get shut so it is hard to lock it

none of the bedroom/bathroom doors in the house will close completely (they will scrape on the door frame if you try....you can tell others have had this issue before we were there...so privacy is an issue...we just didn't even try to close them all the way)
there is no washer or dryer
there are no screens in the back bedroom so you cannot open the window...however there is also a set of patio doors in there (not counting the other 2 sets in the living area)
and the house was not very clean when we arrived. When we went to bed at night there was sand in our sheets and we had not been at the beach or anywhere to attract sand
and we had to clean the floors because they needed it badly (luckily they keep a vacuum and swiffer there in the cleaning closet so we were able to use that)
and make sure you bring extra towels
trash bags
etc because there is not extra there so you will need them. But honestly
the house has some quirks
but you are not going to find perfection.....we would definately rent this one again :) and for the most part were very happy with our choice.

Mon Aug 13 2018 20:33:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Peter Roderique
Mon Aug 13 2018 20:33:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Our 2nd stay at Gone Fishin‚Äô in the years of daddy-daughter trips to Oscoda. The cabin is roomy and clean. Some supplies such as dish soap and laundry detergent were depleted. Neighbors friendly and called us outside one morning to see a bald eagle in one of the big trees by the dock! A convenient location for local activities and will be on our list of possibilities next year.

Mon Aug 13 2018 17:43:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Shirley Clark
Mon Aug 13 2018 17:43:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: The resort was very clean and the cabin was very updated; Very nice place to vacation for families; the lake huron beach was fantastic for kids to play and swim; So relaxing and would definitely stay here again.

Sat Aug 11 2018 20:07:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mary benndtt
review: This was our second year renting cedar lake haven...very comfortable home
relaxing.

Thu Aug 09 2018 18:01:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Laura Kanclerz
review: We had a wonderful
but quick 3-night stay here. The beach is perfect for kids and the house was just as shown here/as expected. Not too far from town and did a day trip to Iargo Springs and Lumberman's Monument.

Wed Aug 08 2018 16:41:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Matt McCarthy
Wed Aug 08 2018 16:41:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Doesn't disappoint! Fifth year in a row visiting with 2 other families. Simple accommodations on a beautiful beach.

Wed Aug 08 2018 10:13:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Janet Boschma
Wed Aug 08 2018 10:13:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: When we booked our vacation the cottage was called Tina and jeff‚Äôs beach house. We were pleased with the overall experience. The sandy beach and shallow lake front were wonderful. The out dated electric was a bit of a challenge. Trying to figure the TV system was a challenge as well. The DVD player was not plugged in so we had to purchase an extension cord. In spite of device issues we enjoyed a wonderful vacation. We would certainly mark this as a spot to revisit.

Tue Aug 07 2018 19:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Seri & Mike Fenech
review: This cottage by far was the most wonderful place to stay
it was the best vacation that we have had in some time. Thank you for sharing your Peace of Heaven with our family. The Fenech's

Tue Aug 07 2018 11:55:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Margaret Weinert
review: We have always had a great time coming here
for many years now
peaceful and quiet!

Tue Aug 07 2018 11:31:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Shantel Vanhorn
Tue Aug 07 2018 11:31:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Family enjoyed our weekend stay!! Great location if your wanting to stay right on the water. Cabin was nicely decorated. Bathroom needed a mini blind or curtain since the window is located towards the parking lot. I used a towel over the window for privacy. WiFi did not work but listing basically prepared you for that one!

Tue Aug 07 2018 08:52:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Katherine VanWormer
review: Wonderful clean home right on the lake. Disappointed we didn‚Äôt notice there was no grill since we brought a propane tank and bannister railing on porch was rotted
breaking free causing a mishap.Overall a great place to vacation and close to town.

Mon Aug 06 2018 16:23:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Regina Sander
review: I don't like giving negative reviews
but I would've appreciated this info before I rented. If you go into this looking at the cabin as a tiny step up from outdoor camping
I suppose this rental would be acceptable. I chose this one because it stated it slept 6 and I thought we could use the extra pull out couch
however it was not very comfortable. It was relatively clean

although the bedrooms were cramped and the carpet felt damp and musty. There were cobwebs in the bedrooms so I could tell it had been a while that it had been occupied and/or cleaned. The dishes were not very clean and several of the spoons in the drawer were not washed at all and very sticky. All of these things I could look past

as it IS a cabin. 
 
 The biggest problem with this cabin is that the toilet didn't flush. There is a sign next to it saying to hold the handle down

so obviously this has been an issue but that strategy only worked every 4-5 hours or so -- not really useful for 4 people and very frustrating to deal with on  vacation . We were able to use the cabin #1 across the courtyard and that had all laminate floors

was bigger and the plumbing in the bathroom worked great. 
 Also note that if you do need the Wifi there
it only works if you stand by the office building. There was no signal in the cabin at all for us. Not a big deal if you're trying to disconnect

but frustrating if you need it. The property itself could've used some cleaning as there was a folded up wet area rug laying in the courtyard during our stay...not sure if that was a guest's doing or what

but it was there for several days. 
 
 I have to say that Jeyko at the Perfect Landing office very nice and helpful in trying to find a solution

but I would not recommend this particular cabin for the reasons stated above. 
 
 Pros: The property has a nice little beach with a fire pit so that was nice. There were grills available in the courtyard. There was a working fridge and air conditioning in the unit.

Mon Aug 06 2018 12:50:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Terri McEldowney
Mon Aug 06 2018 12:50:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Nice home close to beach. Only downside were beds. Couch pull-outs very uncomfortable for those of us who had the maximum people staying there.

Mon Aug 06 2018 11:54:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Lisa Lapinski
review: We came here with a large group of friends for the weekend and had such a fun time. The pictures do not do it justice it's a beautiful view and a very spacious property. The main house is the nicest to stay in as it's the most modern/least rustic and has a kitchen that was perfect for breakfasts and hanging out in the morning. The first cabin (closest to the water) was used as more of the party spot as it has music
a bar
a deck
overlooks the water

etc. The other two cabins closest to the road are cute but very rustic. We did have some issues with lights not working in the two little cabins. 
 
 Pros: beautiful view
accomodates 20 people
close to town
lots of space for yard games
has a grill
two firepits

etc
 
 Cons: only 1 full shower in main home and two tubs in cabins. We thought this would be more of an issue but it really wasn't that big of a deal as the tubs had hoses to rinse off with and you're mostly out at the lake all day. The bathroom in cabin 1 by the water was great but the toilet seemed to have issues flushing almost anything all weekend. No solid waste is allowed and liquid waste wouldn't flush half the time. Lastly
beach is very rocky so make sure you bring water shoes. If you have them
it's not an issue. Overall
pros really outweigh the cons.

Mon Aug 06 2018 11:11:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sammy
review: We stayed here for a girls weekend away and it was beautiful and clean. We loved the property and exploring the idea of literally being away from it all. The owner lives nearby and was very friendly and helpful. We did have an experience with bats coming into the home
which added to the stories we could tell from our weekend away
but was also quite terrifying. Overall
it was a great experience!

Mon Aug 06 2018 10:47:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Susan Plude
review: Breakaway was wonderful ! Had so much room and charm. The front sunroom was so relaxing to sit and visit or read in

each other room had plenty of space for all to feel comfortable. We only had 4-6 people staying but had groups of 4 visiting and had lots of seating to visit. House had everything you would need to cook home meals or grill out. Also had plenty of books to read

games and toys for young children and a great play area upstairs. Even had outside toys for kids to use. The stairs were a bit steep so had to be mindful coming down. I will definitely look to rent this home again next time coming to Tawas area !!!

Mon Aug 06 2018 10:24:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Deanna Turner
Mon Aug 06 2018 10:24:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Perfect Beach. Very clean. We will be staying at Beach Blessings again.

Sat Aug 04 2018 16:26:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rene Culross
Sat Aug 04 2018 16:26:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Great property. Close to both Oscoda and East Tawas. We easily fit 4 adults without feeling like we were tripping over each other especially at meal time. The deck felt private and secluded even though we were next door to Tiki Too.

Sat Aug 04 2018 11:29:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Gada
Sat Aug 04 2018 11:29:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: 5th year coming to these cottages and we keep coming back. Spacious and functioning cabins.

Thu Aug 02 2018 15:57:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: James petteys
review: Spent 5 days here with family...the best part was the location
the beach
and the beautiful lake and view...we enjoyed the deck and screened in porch also. However

there were a few drawbacks....the musty smell of the cabin and the strong smell of the well water when we showered. UghüôÅ....husband was disappointed in basic cable .....he enjoys watching Tiger baseball.

Thu Aug 02 2018 15:41:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: David B Ledbetter
review: What a wonderful place to relax and get away! The newly renovated cottage is clean and spacious and beautifully decorated. The waves lapping on the shore sing you to sleep at night. The proximity to the Tawas Point State Park made for wonderful trips to the beach for picnics
bird-watching

nature hikes and sun-bathing. Two fire pits gave us options for our late night bonfire & s'more roast. Don't miss G's pizzeria and Marion's ice cream parlor in town. Thank you so much for making 007 available. We enjoyed ourselves immensely.

Thu Aug 02 2018 10:25:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Nicolle H.
review: Just Chillin' was just perfect for our family. We had a great time on the sandy beach and in the beautiful Saginaw Bay waters of lake Huron. It was clear
clean and shallow many yards out. The cabin was spacious for our family of five and provided some much needed R & R.

Wed Aug 01 2018 18:22:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Marissa
review: Excellent beach

Wed Aug 01 2018 13:18:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jeff Obertyniuk
review: Great experience! Cute place
nice and clean
can see the lake from the cottage
nice beach area
cozy cabin. Had everything we needed. Did not have a single issue. Happened to be there for the car show
which was surprisingly pretty cool! Will definitely go back!!

Wed Aug 01 2018 12:59:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Brittany
review: I was very pleased with the Sandy Beach Cottages and Perfect Landing! Wed Aug 01 2018 08:59:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cheryl Bogasky
Wed Aug 01 2018 08:59:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This place is cute but not lakefront it is lake access which is a big difference. The lakefront cottage is 1 of 3 in a row style the Queen Bee is in the center of the 3. The owner of lakefront cottage is a crazy nut when it comes to his property he wants no one on his property period. And guess what his sister owns the other side of the Queen bee. So he threatens to tow your vehicle your parking spot is no bigger than my car so he can legally do it. He went completely crazy on me about 5 ft of parking. He mowed between the cottages from 10 am to 530pm sat. Crazy let the mower sit and just run. DO NOT GO THERE FOR LAKEFRONT OR PEACE AND QUIET YOU WILL GET NEITHER. You have 10 ft lake access crazy man up front has boat hoist all along his beach to block you. Then to top it off he patks his van so you can't even see the lake. But Perfect Landing did credit me a day of my stay they felt bad about this. DONT DO IT

Tue Jul 31 2018 19:23:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathi
Tue Jul 31 2018 19:23:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We had a wonderful stay! The cabin was just what we needed for our little beach getaway!

Tue Jul 31 2018 13:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Theresa Weiss
review: Very nice little place. Very clean and cozy
it was nice to have a Washer/Dryer and the kitchen had everything we needed. We were a little surprised at how small the bathroom really was
it worked for us

but maybe not for a bigger person. Somewhat disappointed in the beach area located on the path from the house. We had to water in water to get to the beach front and found it not real suitable for swimming or hanging out there. We would rent again if need a place to stay

Tue Jul 31 2018 12:35:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jessica Poff
review: This rental was amazing! My girls and I stayed here for 4 nights and did not want to leave! The house was immaculate and fully equipped. The bed was incredibly comfortable (I slept in both the King and the Queen). The beach was awesome and you can't beat the view! We visited a lot of local places
but the whole time we were there we wished we were back at the rental on the beach. I've already called to book a week for next year! We are so incredibly happy with our experience!

Tue Jul 31 2018 10:26:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Lisa
review:
Wow! 
 This place is fantastic! The Bay House was immaculately clean
open and airy
and every single detail was just so perfect! The little mini bar
decks of cards and poker chips
and chess set were a great addition for our family of avid gamers! All the artwork and decor was so thoughtfully sourced and displayed to create such a cozy space
we really felt at home! The location of the Bay House is also pretty perfect! You're right across the street from a small public beach
and just a block from all the great restaurants
shops
and galleries on Newman. We also loved that you included a convenient rolling cart with a beach umbrella
two chairs
a mini cooler
and a sand bucket! How thoughtful and handy! We highly recommend this home
and we're already looking forward to staying again
next summer! (Please note
the address listed is NOT accurate- the accurate address is 404  W. Bay Street,  not "Bay Street," as Google Maps will display a different home)

Tue Jul 31 2018 10:02:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Linda Hutchison
review: Wonderful 3 days! Really enjoyed this property with my family; great layout
clean
comfortable
amenities like movies
games for all ages. Beach a few steps away...Totally recommend!

Tue Jul 31 2018 09:11:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: MARY MULKA
review: As usual

the sink is still not draining after 5 years along with the noise it makes. The septic system back up Saturday morning and smelled horrible right outside our cabin. It did not get repaired until Monday afternoon at 3 and still smelled the rest of the week. The oven
which has been reported

500. You put it on warm

still

Mon Jul 30 2018 11:05:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: LISA SEALSCOTT
review: We had to make arrangements at the last minute and were fortuneate enought to get into this cabin. None of us had never been there before and had no idea what we were getting into. I was just what we were looking for and absolutely loved it. We are considering doing the same thing next year for our Girl's Weekend. However

we can not do a week long thing and can only do a long weekend. The only problem was that there was not coffee makerin this cabin so I went to Walmart and bought one on Saturday morning. That was ok tho as now I have a back up one at home. Wonderful stay
thank you very much!!

Mon Jul 30 2018 09:59:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: The Wales Family
review: Great location
no wi-fi was a bummer
had some issues called company and they didn't fix what was wrong or didn't replace the chairs that were broken.

Mon Jul 30 2018 08:43:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jaimie Hutchison
review: What a lovely property. My mother in law rented it for some family to spend time together. It was perfect. Just a little walk to the beach at the end of the road
the public beach
town and the movie theater. The layout is nice because it is spread out. The remodel is great
they made the most of each inch of space. We enjoyed our stay and look forward to coming back!

Sun Jul 29 2018 09:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sharmaine Rederstorf
review: This was our 2nd time staying here. The 1st time being a few years ago. We love the new updated kitchen
new carpet and the new beach front deck. All very nice. The beach is great too. The location is perfect. Close to golf courses

Au Gres and Tawas. Looks like some updates are being planned for the room attached to the garage. That would be great. The room still has a musty smell and could use better air flow through it. The house could still use a good deep cleaning as stated in other posts but was better than the past. Other than that. Our family looks forward to staying here again in the future.

Sun Jul 29 2018 08:21:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: David Light
review: This was our second year at this property. Having children with us
we really like the location for bike riding and walking to nearby restaurants. I appreciate very much that WIFI was installed at the property for this year
as cell service is very limited and spotty in the area and living in a  connected  world
everyone has devices that need WIFI. The ever-changing shoreline
sandbar and beach were nice this year. We like the cottage
and feel comfortable there. We did experience a problem with mice this season
but that can be easily remedied and I certainly hope something is done about it. I'm surprised that the housekeeping people didn't address this obvious problem
particularly with the large amount of mouse droppings in the drawer beneath the oven. I would still like to have a contiguous two-week stay in July
and so far
it hasn't been possible to arrange it. That is the only thing that may affect my return in the future.

Fri Jul 27 2018 17:12:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Vladimir Stchekine
Fri Jul 27 2018 17:12:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Beautiful accommodation great view and very private.

Wed Jul 25 2018 06:50:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Marline Jones
Wed Jul 25 2018 06:50:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We arrive first to the wrong place thanks to Google maps. It changd the street to lane and I didn't realize it until we arrive to a place with no home. But when we did arrive to the right place the first thing I did was check to make sure it was clean. It was very clean. Then we checked out the view in the back yard. Nice little fire pit by that water. My brothers fished the whole weekend. I also enjoyed sitting by the water in between raindrops. I don't recommend the middle of July reading other peoples reviews that were left in the notebook at the house. It rained the whole 3 days were there. But the house was like home. Had everything we needed. Good thing it was a cool weekend because the portable air didn't cool the house down but the one room. We brought board games and ends as there was no t.v I slept in the room with the bathroom. The bed was a little hard and Uncomfortable for myself. We met the neighbor to the right. Very friendly. We ended up having some beers with him and he let my brothers take out his paddle boat. That would be something the rental should invest in could be some kind of water thing. A paddle boat or kayaks would be nice. The rental is close to town we did check out the bowling alley and the local Irish pub. We would come back and definitely recommend this rental to family and friends. In face I video chatted my mom and gave her a tour. The price wasn't that bad either.

Tue Jul 24 2018 15:28:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Tonja Shockley
Tue Jul 24 2018 15:28:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Property was great! They just forgot our towels and wash clothes and we called and left a message and did not receive a call back. We had to go buy towels to take a shower. Other then that the stay was Great. I do wish it had been closer to Oscoda where our family is located.

Tue Jul 24 2018 15:19:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Heather Condon
Tue Jul 24 2018 15:19:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Absolutely perfect for a last minute mini vacation. Everything was clean and the shared beach area was very nice. It was easy to find and not too far from Tawas.

Tue Jul 24 2018 13:23:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Patricia
review: Cabin was well stocked and perfect for our family! Very comfortable. Didn‚Äôt get to enjoy the deck/ fire pit due to rain
however the cabin was plenty big enough to relax indoors. Would definitely recommend and return again.

Tue Jul 24 2018 12:51:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Shari Money
review: Enjoyed a week in July staying here. All the little personal touches made the cabin feel like home. You can feel the love and care the owners put into the place. Great place for kids and it's pet friendly too
what more could you ask for? The back yard is adorable
enjoy a game of horseshoe while your there. I would like to come back someday.

Tue Jul 24 2018 04:16:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: The Schmidts
review: Awesome experience! After several years of marginal beach rental experiences we found a gem! Very clean. Fully furnished means a complete fully equipped kitchen (pots/pans/utensils/dishes)
several bathrooms
laundry room
hot water/lots of water pressure (five showering and never ran out of hot water)
lots of new towels/linens
TV (we never used). Everything! Our party included Grandma & Grandpa/single Son/Daughter & Son-In-Law/2 Grandchildren and were not crowded at all. Unit is on the beach. Full patio at shoreline
fire pit
gas BBQ grill
beach chairs

floating toys. Has it all. Our bedroom faced the water with grand view of lake - we could hear the waves lapping the beach all night long. Beach was sand with some small rocks (found a Petoskey stone) - water does not get deep fast - great for 10 and 7 year olds to swim and play
dock to sit on

but also has a huge tree for those of us who like shade while watching kids play in water. Ample parking - even when all units are occupied. Best review possible-we signed up for a week next year! Completely recommend!

Mon Jul 23 2018 16:48:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Elaine
review: The place was very nice and allowed us all to have space we needed. The hot tub was disgusting. Someone came to look @ it & said they‚Äôd return. They never did

but someone else did but they didn‚Äôt know how to drain it or clean it. For the safety of the children we locked it. Fishing there was nice as was canoeing. Overall experience was good. Few items were broken- towel holder
swing
kitchen cupboard & spindles on a couple of chairs.

Mon Jul 23 2018 09:32:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mark Schwartz
Mon Jul 23 2018 09:32:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review:
Everything was perfect new air-conditioner the kitchen with set up nice perfect...For breakfast we went to Mama kitchen A couple miles down the street and they have kayaking nearby also ...It was very clean and the beds were comfortable
 Bring a boogie for the tasty waves 
 This is our second time here only thing that I would make the experience better would be a volleyball net and a fan in the bottom floor bedroom thx guys mark Schwartz see ya next year

Mon Jul 23 2018 08:42:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jim Nrown
review: This was an awesome place for our family get-together. It was a comfortable
easy living house and was supplied with everything our group of 11 needed. I think it was a perfect combination of house
yard
beach and water

and we used it all. The water stayed shallow for a good bit and had a sandy bottom--made it easy to not have to worry about the little kids. It also got really warm as a result. I couldn't believe how fine and soft the sand was . The gazebo was also a highlight. It allowed for bug free and even bug spray free evenings outdoors. The view
and especially the sunrise
was just icing on the cake!

Sun Jul 22 2018 12:07:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Carlos Bennett
Sun Jul 22 2018 12:07:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We booked a last minute vacation and were hesitant about what we were going to get. When we arrived we were pleasantly surprised. The house was beautiful. It was clean and decorated nicely. There was more than enough room for our family of 4. Location was not far from local beaches and shopping. The property was semiprivate and allowed plenty of room for the kids to play outside.

Sat Jul 21 2018 18:45:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: maynard buszek
review: 1) upon entering

the temp was 87 degrees because the back of the portable a/c (which was running on high) had disconnected. The wrong size exhaust vent was simply duct taped to the unit. 
 2) no tv/cable for the entire stay despite contacting Perfect Landing
 3) very strong animal urine smell in the carpet in the bedroom facing the water

and lesser odor in the front room carpet. The bedroom carpet was damp.
 4) older bathroom toilet drains verrrry slowly

despite vigorous plunging
 5) the kitchen sink drips non-stop
 6) the  reverse osmosis system  is simply a Culligan water cooler
 7) the trim below the entrance door was hanging loose and packed with leaves - obviously has been like that since last fall. This is a trip hazard.
 8) the outside light fixture by the entry door has no bulbs and is hanging by a wire.
 9) the "queen" beds are full-size
 10) the newer bathroom sink barely drains
 11) the neighbors (very friendly!) shared with us that the prior two sets of renters said the house had not been cleaned 
 
 We had contacted Perfect Landing (as recommended in the agreement) re: #1
7 and 8

spoke with Jeyko Ludena and no action occurred while we were there regarding these issues. 
 There are serious deferred maintenance issues and health issues. Without this property being cleaned up

it is not safe to stay in.
 Extremely disappointed after having good experiences at other Perfect Landing rentals in the past.

Sat Jul 21 2018 16:20:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Doug Sivyer
review: I had not been to Oscoda for 40 years. We used to take family vacation in this area every year when I was K-12 age. We loved this cottage. Being right on the water front was a must for me and this fit the bill perfectly. The walk to the beach area is short and dry. You have your own private beach front and the water was so clear and fresh! I enjoyed swimming and no rocks on the lake floor

just cool clean sand. So very quiet and relaxing. Two recommendations: Michigan is getting hotter these days in the summer so AC would be nice. The cottage had box fans so we used those and the water off the lake kept the cottage comfortable. Temps were in the low eighties at day and 65-70 at night. July 14-17 when we stayed. We rented a couple movies for movie night but could not watch them as we could not figure out how to use the 3 remotes to get the DVD player working. Instructions for that would have been nice. Overall I would highly recommend this cottage. Perfect landing associates were helpful and responded timely to our needs.

Sat Jul 21 2018 14:32:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Craig and Pat Karas
review: Excellent facility
we totally enjoyed our stay. Our son appreciated the dock space for his boat.

Sat Jul 21 2018 09:25:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Linda Cluey
review: Great place to stay. Grandkids had a wonderful time. They want to go back. Lake Huron has wonderful views in the morning. Plenty of chairs. Clean
no problem with WiFi or TV. We would have brought more pans for cooking fish if we had known there was only one frying pan. We would definitely visit again.

Sat Jul 21 2018 00:46:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Martha Hinsberg
Sat Jul 21 2018 00:46:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: My boyfriend and I loved it here!! We liked the small area of the beach and where it was located. We walked down a few houses to get more sandy beach for a day to lay out and everyone was okay and friendly about it. The inside was so cute and we had a fantastic time for his first visit to Lake Huron. Would stay again 100%.

Fri Jul 20 2018 20:29:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: cassi meldrum
Fri Jul 20 2018 20:29:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Loved the location! So nice to be able to walk Rt out onto the beach every day. Could use a deep cleaning. Main bedroom was extremely dirty along the wall the bed was on. Had to move the bed to plug in a baby monitor and wish I hadn‚Äôt. Lots of dust and cob webs. Rest of the house was pretty clean. Furniture definitely has not been moved for a good cleaning in a long time. I wouldn‚Äôt have noticed but having to set up pack and plays and making it safe for the kids I had to move a few things. Bathroom door handle fell off while my toddler was in the bathroom thankfully door wasn‚Äôt shut all the way or she would have locked herself in. Doorway thresholds could use some trim since there is a big difference going from room to room. I had to put rugs over all the door ways so my little ones didn‚Äôt get hurt. Main bedroom DOES NOT have air conditioning which was not stated. Room got very stuffy during the day. I was also a little concerned I didn‚Äôt see smoke detectors in the house. I could be mistaken but I did not notice any.
response: Thank you for your input
your feedback was very helpful to know what can be improved! Glad you could soak in the breathtaking view of Lake Huron and enjoy the beach. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Thu Jul 19 2018 11:26:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Diane Kennedy
review: Peaceful! We had a wonderful stay in Grand View 1 and we both thought it was one of the most peaceful vacations that we have had. The cabin was just what we expected
it was updated enough with modern kitchen cabinets and flat screen TV
but just worn enough to make you feel comfortable and like you're staying in a cabin. The Pros: The kitchen was adequately stocked with dishes
silverware
glasses
pots and pans (only one fry pan)
bowls

salt and pepper & toaster. They came on our last full day and installed a new cable & internet system which the man said would give us better wi-fi and internet. Since we didn't have the new password we couldn't try out the wi-fi to recommend

but the cable gave us all the basic channels. We found the cabin to be very clean when we arrived and we really enjoyed the deck and the wonderful view of the lake. There was a grill but we didn't end up using it so I'm not sure how well it worked. They provided hand soap and dish soap but you might want to bring shower gel for the shower. They had a nice area to sit around the fire pit if you were so inclined and a nice swing down by the water. Although the cabins are fairly close together and you can see onto everyone's deck

the other visitors were quiet and respectful of the neighbors. We also found the location was nice because it was a straight shot down US 23 to Alpena which was 20 miles away and you had access to restaurants
parks

WalMart etc. Now the Cons: there were only full size beds and the box springs were squeaky and needed replaced. This wasn't bad enough that I couldn't sleep but they weren't the best. The dishwasher was really loud so you don't want to run it before you go to bed. There was a coffee pot under the sink so we assumed it was broken but I didn't test it because I brought my own. It would have been nice if there was a dish drainer under the sink so you had a place to put your dishes if you washed them by hand and if they put some dish towels in a drawer by the sink. My husband was disappointed that there was a rocky bottom in the swim area but we brought our water shoes so it wasn't a big problem. The kids that were there seemed to enjoy it all right. We mostly floated around in our tubes so it was fine with me.
 
 Overall this is a lovely place and we would gladly come back again when we are in need of some rest and relaxation!

Wed Jul 18 2018 18:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Gerre Johnson-Derus
Wed Jul 18 2018 18:49:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Rise and Shine. There was plenty of room for the 11 of us and the beach was beautiful. The gazebo was an very pleasant addition and was our main hang out at night. There are very nice neighbors on both sides and a friendly dog who came over to swim with us.

Mon Jul 16 2018 22:34:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kristen Chapman-McLarty
review: Really loved our stay. Dishwasher wasn't hooked up properly and the issue was not resolved during our stay. Other than that
we loved the property
the home
and the decor.

Mon Jul 16 2018 19:43:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sandra Somers
review: Staying in the Boat House is the best
the beach is wonderful and the water was crystal clear. It's a great family vacation spot.

Mon Jul 16 2018 17:30:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Paula Stanley
Mon Jul 16 2018 17:30:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We had a great time. I never knew that Lake Huron would be so cold in the Summer. The house was just right for the four of us. Another chair in the living room would be nice. All the cooking tools you need are here.

Mon Jul 16 2018 13:05:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kristin
review: I stayed in cottage 1 with my family & my sisters family
and my parents stayed in cottage 2. Overall we really enjoyed our stay. However if your planning to stay
there are some things I would have wanted to know before hand.... The beds were very uncomfortable in both cottages
defiantly needs to be upgraded. Also in cottage 2 there is a small wall unit for air (it really couldn‚Äôt keep the place cool) and there were no doors on the bedrooms... The lake was beautiful

water was very shallow way out (but no fishing off the dock) and clear but extremely rocky- make sure everyone brings water shoes!!!! Cottage 1 has central air which was wonderful! WIFI is pretty much non existent at the resort

which was a bummer only because I have a baby and couldn‚Äôt hook up the monitor to my phone as I do at home ( I bought a cheap one in town so we could atleast hear the baby if he was napping). Also we couldn‚Äôt get any tvs to work in either of the cottages

&13. Overall the price was great
the cottage was clean

review: this was probably the nicest cabin rental we have ever been to! well stocked

nicely kept
private
wooded back yard with a fire pit. just a tip
wear water shoes to the beach that's a quick walk away
it is very stony

Mon Jul 16 2018 11:35:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Anthony E Waller
review: It was a very nice rental
the owners were extremely nice and went out of their way to make sure everything was great. They even took us out for a 2 hour boat ride around the lake.

Sat Jul 14 2018 11:11:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Daniel Cannoy
review: Myself
wife

and two daughters stayed here for a week and half this year for the Fourth of July. We were less than pleased with what we saw when we arrived. The A/C was off when we walked in and it was hot and humid inside
when we turned on the A/C the room temp was 85. The master bedroom smelled like urine and mildew
and when we pulled back the covers the blue sheet had a large what I assume to be urine stain. Most of the extra linens sat on dusty shelves
so we just went out and purchased our own sheets to use. The book the renters left in the cabin says there is Direct TV
but it is not hooked up and that there are fishing poles to use by the river

but all there is is a storage box with a couple of chairs filled with leaves and cob-webs. All-in-all I had high expectations for my stay here because I thought the property would be large enough and comfortable enough for my family in Oscoda to come visit while I was up from New Mexico. It may be large
but the ‚Äúportable‚Äù A/C unit does not get the house under 83 degrees during summer months

or at least it didn‚Äôt during our week and a half stay. It isn‚Äôt a bad place to rest your head if you like sleeping in the heat. 
 
 When I spoke with the rental team they said they would look in to my complaints
but never heard back. I would rather tent camp
then waste my time renting a cabin again.

Thu Jul 12 2018 23:18:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Misty Barrells
review: Pros: there was plenty of room for everyone to sleep. Two bedrooms upstairs and 1 bedroom downstairs with an additional full size bed and twin in the basement. The wrap around porch was nice. It was kid friendly for the most part. The grill had propane and the kitchen had pots/pans
cups

etc. The property had a great view of the lake which was relaxing. The owners of the house were extremely nice and friendly to work with.
 
 Cons: The water was my main issue. I was not prepared to see brown water coming out of the faucet. Truly looked like dirty lake water and smelled. My only other complaint is if you‚Äôre the type who needs some sort of fan to sleep with make sure you bring your own fan. I was told their were ‚Äúceiling fans throughout the house‚Äù when I asked if there was A/C. This was not the case. Only one working ceiling fan located in the living room. There is one ceiling fan in the bedroom but it is not hooked up we were told. That was a major bummer because it‚Äôs was very warm in the house making it miserable to try and sleep. Also it states washer/dryer so I was excited to be able to do our laundry there as we stayed so I didn‚Äôt have to do it all when we got home. The washer did not work but the owner came over to look at it and stated he would get a new one in there after we left. Didn‚Äôt help us but it was nice they were going to replace it. And there isn‚Äôt a dishwasher like it states?

Thu Jul 12 2018 16:58:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: heidi

Mon Jul 09 2018 13:13:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cheryl Hawkins
Mon Jul 09 2018 13:13:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We had a great time at TimeAway! Charming interior and very quite!

Mon Jul 09 2018 12:50:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rebecca H
