Mon Jul 09 2018 12:45:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rebecca H
review: This was our second stay at Real Cozy & we look forward to returning in future years! Great location with short walk to beach & close to town. Clean
cozy & well-equipped. Highly recommend this rental home!

Mon Jul 09 2018 12:29:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Russ Korba
review: We have stayed here before. It is a great place to stay. On the water and quiet. To say however that it is air conditions is a stretch. It is advertised with TV. Yes it has a TV but gets no channels at all
DISH. I don't know if it should be advertised with TV.

review: This year
marked our 20th anniversary of staying in Oscoda
17 of those years at Whispering Winds. We love our home away from home. Our kids have grown up vacationing here and now we need two cabins for everyone. Cabin #6 is nice
but the bedrooms are very small. There‚Äôs not enough room for a nightstand on both sides of the bed
but it‚Äôs not that big of a deal because we come for the beach

 The addition of smart TVs is a great idea

but the WiFi signal was not strong enough for anyone to use it. Hopefully they will get a powerful router and extender to fix this problem. We used my husband‚Äôs hotspot on his phone to get our tv to work

 There is a musty odor to the cabins. The air conditioning helps with the smell a little bit. Overall

we really enjoy our yearly vacation at Whispering Winds. It‚Äôs under new management now and we hope there will be updates here and there to help make our stay even more enjoyable! I would love if there were new/more cupboards and a garbage disposal in the kitchen!üòä

 PROS: Property and house are very spacious

ample firewood for fire pit and owners were friendly CONS: No cell service and no land line to be able to call out when something breaks on the property

Wed Nov 08 2017 11:34:25 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Angie
review: My family rented this property Labor day weekend. I would first like to say that the rental staff was very nice to deal with. Their communication is great and they were very accommodating to my situation. I rate them 5 stars! The second part of this review is the property...that was another story. We did love the location of the property and the beach

water and outdoor space was wonderful. The indoor space however was a bit disappointing. We all loved the pool table in the living room 
 but it was missing the 9 ball.....i totally understand that this is a  cabin  setting
but I feel that the cleanliness was lacking. My boyfriend and I showed up before the rest of my family and we spent a good 2 hours washing the bedding that smelled musty
and old
dissinfecting counters
washing dishes that appeared to be wiped out and placed back into the cupboards

vacuuming the floors and dusting the surfaces that were so caked in dust you could write you name in it. The spare towels that were in the closet were so smelly I don't know the last time they were washed. There were no dryer sheets to put in with the bedding. The kitchen sponge was an old used sponge that appeared to have food stuck to it from the last time it was used. We looked all over for a new one and I had to call my sister before she left her house and ask her to bring a new sponge from home so we would have something clean to wash dishes with. I'm not sure who is responsible for cleaning this place but I feel as though someone needs to reevaluate the services because I don't consider myself a clean freak

but this was not acceptable and honestly grossed us all out. After we got everything clean we were able to relax and had a wonderful time with family. I think that this place is a really great vacation home with lots of potential but someone needs to deal with the cleaning situation.
Wed Nov 08 2017 11:34:25 GMT-0500 (EST).response: We're sorry to hear your experience was not perfect. Your issue had been addressed in a timely manner. We expect 2018 to bring about great changes and revisions to the property!

review: Our stay at Amore exceeded our expectations. If you are looking for a place right on the beach that's fully furnished

then I highly recommend Amore. Close to Huron National Park and downtown Oscoda where you can walk along the pier on Lake Huron. The house was fully furnished including board games for rainy days and the kitchen had everything needed for cooking including pots
pans
serving dishes
and every cooking utensil you would need. Beautiful patio overlooking Lake Huron included table
chairs
seat cushions
and umbrella. We would definitely rent this again.

Fri Jul 07 2017 23:07:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Debbie Maples
review: Decorated nicely but could have been better cleaned. Lot's of cobwebs and bugs but it is a cottage. Front door needs to be looked at. At first I couldn't get it open and then I couldn't lock it. Double check to be sure it's locked all the time. Broom but no dust pan? Outdoor b-que looked like it hadn't been used in ages. Very dirty . Location was great
right on the beach and it was sandy. Unit just needed some TLC but I would stay there again for the price.

Wed Jul 05 2017 20:46:26 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Bri
Wed Jul 05 2017 20:46:26 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This place has been in our stays: clean and comfortable. We plan to rent again!

Wed Jul 05 2017 12:50:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Elias
Wed Jul 05 2017 12:50:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: I will make my review simple " I enjoyed staying at Nature's Song"

Wed Jul 05 2017 12:39:10 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kerri
review: The location was amazing and we would stay again! However
the place could use a deep cleaning. The windows were dirty and the window sills were black and had dead insects in them. Also
there were cobwebs throughout and the extra bedding smelled of mildew.

Wed Jul 05 2017 12:16:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Melissa Wright
review: We had an excellent stay
such a beautiful property! All the amenities were provided in a wonderful location. The rental was clean and homey. We can't wait to return!

Wed Jul 05 2017 11:39:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Aaron Young
review: Property was not cleaned to my satisfaction upon arrival. The coffee maker had old grounds in it that were growing mold. The beds were clean

although the blankets were nicely laid on the bed rather than being 'made'. Also some of the blinds were missing panels making it hard to get the cottage dark at night. Overall it was a great stay and would recommend it to others. We had a fantastic experience in 2016 and came back in 2017. I just feel the cleaning contractor should be looked into.

Wed Jul 05 2017 08:12:26 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: karen madias
review: been coming to surfside for many years

and you can't beat the location near the water! #13 could use some updating and the toaster/light above the sink was an electrical hazard. We were so sad to hear of the passing of Walt. He was so nice and helpful when we stayed last September 2017. We hope to come back for many more years!

Wed Jun 28 2017 15:54:30 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Josh
Wed Jun 28 2017 15:54:30 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We had a great holiday weekend truly Away from it all

Wed Jun 28 2017 11:41:11 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Donna Stafford
review: Perfect for our large family get-together. Something for everyone! The main house is modern and very comfortable. The lake house (my favorite) with its log-cabin construction and beautiful view of the lake provided a wonderful gathering place. The small swimming area might not suit everyone
but for our purposes
and the time of year
it was just right. The red and yellow cabins each had their own bit of charm
and provided privacy for families with children. The property is spacious and beautiful.

Tue Jun 27 2017 13:59:56 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Doug
Tue Jun 27 2017 13:59:56 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: It is a great beach and sandy bottom lake that you can walk out a long ways. Kids love it.

Fri May 19 2017 11:22:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Ken and Diana Marlin
review: Delightful spot on Lake Huron. House is very tidy and well appointed. Quiet! We were there with 20 mph winds and 10 foot waves. Could barely hear anything until we opened the door to the thunder of wind and waves. If you want to hear it inside
just open a window or a door!

Fri May 19 2017 11:17:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sheila Ostrander
Fri May 19 2017 11:17:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This property was absolutely FABULOUS! Rented it with two other couple to play cards for the weekend. The house is huge and the bedrooms are all separated for privacy. The kitchens were stocked with everything we needed. The location on the river is fantastic and everything was clean and in perfect working order. The property manager was quick to get back to us when we had a question. It was also 70 degrees in February so that made it even more perfect.

Sun May 07 2017 11:53:05 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Audrey smathers
Sun May 07 2017 11:53:05 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Very quaint lovely cottage. Awsome beach. Great location.

Sun May 07 2017 11:50:26 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jennifer marquart
Sun May 07 2017 11:50:26 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Lovely shabby chic . great beach. Comfortable beds. Didn't smell like mildew. Have stayed here many times. Would highly recommend!

Sat Apr 22 2017 12:49:15 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Khalida B
review: We have been renting the Beach house 1
and 3 for the past 4 years. It has now become our family summer getaway. My family and I love this place since it's super clean
has all the needed items for a family
and so close to town. Wouldn't trade it for the world.

Thu Dec 29 2016 21:41:48 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Joshua
review: As a military member i dont grt to come home often. When i do
this property provides a great gathering place for my family. The layout
dual kitchens
and plenty of place allows my siblings and i to get together in one place. Perfect landing always offers a generous military discount
which is immensly helpful. In addition
having stayed here twice in the pst five years
i will say that the property is improving. Thank you for a wonderful Christmas getaway!!
Thu Dec 29 2016 21:41:48 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Great holiday rental

Mon Oct 31 2016 21:22:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Ronald D. McQuitty
review: My wife and I really enjoyed our 4 night stay from October 14- 17th. It was very peaceful
We were really impressed with the location even though it rained
the view was astonishing ! It was very relaxing
and we found no spiders ! Really Really enjoyed the peace and tranquility! The sound of the waves was so relaxing. We are contemplating perhaps coming again
We thought the TV would have more stations
but its no biggie with all that beauty who needs tv anyway!
Mon Oct 31 2016 21:22:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Dancing with The Waves

Mon Oct 31 2016 18:56:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: robin Ward
review: Overall
we've really enjoyed our stay on both visits. On the second visit
however
there was some mold (black) on one lower part of the shower surround
and a little dustiness here and there. This may be because it was cleaned after the previous guests
but not right before our visit
and who knows how much time elapsed between the stays. Also
it was chilly when we arrived
which is to be expected in October

but we were there for a few hours before we realized that the reason the back bedrooms weren't warming up more quickly was that two of the windows (behind blinds) had been left open. But Dreamer's Delight has a very nice
bright
open living room
and we enjoy the little sunroom
too. So
overall
a very nice rental.that we can stay at to visit my sons who live in the area..
Mon Oct 31 2016 18:56:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Dreamer's Delight

Sat Oct 29 2016 16:32:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Denise
Sat Oct 29 2016 16:32:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Shabby chic cottage in a great location. Good weekend getaway.

Fri Oct 28 2016 16:33:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Chad Hardacre
review: This is our 2nd trip there! Once again
we absolutely love this house! Last time we were there was in 2012
we bought a sign in book...that was so cool to sit and read everybody's experiences! Of course we will be back! Hopefully it doesn't take 4 years this time! ????

Thu Oct 27 2016 02:14:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Carol Porzondek
Thu Oct 27 2016 02:14:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: There were 8 of us and there was plenty of room. Everything was nice and clean. Great location! The hot tub was nice too. We had a small issue with the lockbox for the key and the responsiveness when we called was amazing. I'd definitely recommend.

review: My family lived in this home back in the 60's. We searched for and rented this as a way for my family to reconnect after the death of my mother. So much hasn't changed in 45 years. It was as wonderful as it was when I was 8 years old and felt like we were coming home. Beach in the back
woods in the front
quiet and lovely. The only complaint from anyone was that the toilet area in the main bathroom in the home was a bit claustrophobic. We'll be back someday
when we feel the need to relax and remember.
Wed Oct 12 2016 00:51:41 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Idyllic
Wed Oct 12 2016 00:51:41 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: Were so glad you enjoyed your stay! The fall colors are beautiful this time of year!

Tue Oct 11 2016 23:22:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Lisa Allotta
Tue Oct 11 2016 23:22:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Enjoyed our Weekend at this lovely location... spacious open concept! Had all the comforts of home... would recommend this location!
Tue Oct 11 2016 23:22:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Weekend!!!

Tue Oct 11 2016 20:05:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mike Fry

review: Very nice  cabin
loved having washer/dryer. Felt like a home away from home for our family of four. Was in a secluded location
close enough to town and beaches
yet felt like you weren't in the tourist area. Furniture was good
beds a little old
but it was clean
and served our purposes.
Sat Oct 01 2016 22:48:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Nice getaway

Mon Sep 26 2016 21:34:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Dale Sniegowski
review: We thoroughly enjoyed the property. The amenities were very good. The futons
though
are a bit tough to lounge on. The support bars just get in the way. The Wi-Fi really didn't work either. My smartphone constantly told me that connection was too slow. Not related to the property
someone needs to tell the city officials that running their excessively noisy street cleaner from 4:00 to 6:00 a.m. is just plain WRONG!!!!! It sure gives East Tawas an extremely BAD IMAGE!!!!!!!!!!
Mon Sep 26 2016 21:34:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Wonderful Time in East tawas
Mon Sep 26 2016 21:34:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: So glad you had a enjoyable time :)

Mon Sep 26 2016 19:45:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Brenda
review: We really enjoyed our stay at the house. I don't think the pictures do it justice. The sunrise's were spectacular. Right on the lake was the perfect location for swimming
bonfire or walk on the beach. The house came with all the necessities as well as games and puzzles for entertainment. We would definitely stay here again.
Mon Sep 26 2016 19:45:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Enjoyable stay

we have updated all photos as we do annually we have had some beautiful days to take more photos :)

Fri Sep 23 2016 20:30:42 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: KATHLEEN A HOLZHEI
Fri Sep 23 2016 20:30:42 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: loved it the grandchildren had a ball and are still talking about it will certainly come back next summer we stayed august 17 thru the 20 the kids loved the beach and the murphy bed and the special bathtub adults liked the party store across the road glad they allowed us to bring our pet
Fri Sep 23 2016 20:30:42 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: review surfside #2

Thu Sep 22 2016 01:43:53 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Terrence Hoffman
review: Grand View 1 is a nice cabin. We stayed for six nights and it was very relaxing. The view is great and Grand Lake is a gorgeous location. Other than two nights we had the whole resort to ourselves. We did have a couple issues. I still work part time and needed wifi. The Perfect Landing office was very helpful with access to WiFi but it was not available in our cabin. The TV service was very spotty especially when the other guests were there. Since the Perfect Landing office was closed on the weekend and we did not have a number to give the cable provider we could not improve the situation. The cabin was neat and clean
but the double bed in the primary bedroom was only reasonably comfortable. My wife and I will return to Grand Lake next year
but probably not at Grandview as we will want a queen size bed in a more modern location.
Thu Sep 22 2016 01:43:53 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Grand View 1
response: So sorry the WiFi was any issue at all

on your final receipt is a contact number to reach us 24/7 also known as customer care. Although we could not have fixed the WiFi service ourselves we could have put in a ticket to them for you. We sure hope you decide to stay again in the future it is a great budget friendly place:)

Mon Sep 19 2016 11:47:10 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mike Krolczyk
Mon Sep 19 2016 11:47:10 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Had a wonderful week with the family. The beach and the water Excellent! Had plenty of room for everyone. Kitchen was well stocked with dishes and utensils. The only issue we had was with barbecue grill. It did not work. Also the rugs in the bedrooms were stained. Besides that it was a great place for family memories.
Mon Sep 19 2016 11:47:10 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Up North Paradise

Sat Sep 17 2016 22:04:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jesse P
review: My girlfriend and I struggled to find a place to go on our first vacation together
when she had shown me a picture of this property
I was hooked
I didn't realize how close it was to the lakeshore which was pleasantly surprising. We drove 4.5 hours from lower mid Michigan to stay here
every minute was worth it. I was stunned when we walked through the door upon our arrival to see how well this space was outfitted
it was clean
equipped with utensils
board games
good tv service and wifi as well as was within walking distance of everything
quaint thrift shops
fun bars and grills
tourist shops
this was The best location for us. This place is now my  happy place  just because of the welcomed feeling we felt
I've already recommended steps in the city to several people since our stay here and really hope that they follow through in going here because it truly is magical

especially at night after coming back from dinner after nightfall to find that our pathway and back yard are illuminated in beautiful lights. Steps in the City? Please don't ever stop giving people the same feeling you gave to my girlfriend and I we will return one day :)
title: Steps In the city
and right over the moon
Sat Sep 17 2016 22:04:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay!

Sat Sep 17 2016 14:03:58 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: james mahood
Sat Sep 17 2016 14:03:58 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: beautiful vacation when we stayed here twice so far and we will stay here from now on .the most relaxing time ive ever had love this place .
Sat Sep 17 2016 14:03:58 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: sail inn

Fri Sep 16 2016 00:43:37 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Krystle
review: We stayed at Summer Wind in July 2014 and July 2016. It has a nice sandy beach
though it rained/was cold both times so we spent a lot of time in the house! The picture windows in the living/dining room are breathtaking to view the water. There is a fire pit
you can walk quite a ways on the beach
and there is an awesome screened in dining area where we enjoyed playing cards at night listening to the waves. The house is older

the beds were very uncomfortable and the garage has a musty smell. There are three bathrooms and it sleeps a lot of people for being a small ranch home. There is a washer/dryer too. It has a retro charm to it that made it enchanting the first year

but after staying there a second time it lost its appeal. Hope for nice weather because the location is great. There is a Walmart and gas station not too far north along with fast food and other businesses toward Tawas.
title: Nice beach
basic beach house

Thu Sep 15 2016 18:00:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rae
Thu Sep 15 2016 18:00:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This was a very nice place to stay. It has a beautiful yard and very cozy inside. It was very close to the water and our family enjoyed our bonfire in the backyard. Very quiet neighborhood.
Thu Sep 15 2016 18:00:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Cozy cove

Thu Sep 15 2016 18:00:23 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: LOIS MONVILLE
review: A great place

large enough for all our co-workers to get away and have a great time. The way the house is set up gives ample room so that we are not all on top of each other. Close to town if we needed anything. We had great weather and the firepit was in perfect spot overlooking the water. This is the second time we have been here. We have used perfect landing rentals for quite a few of our weekends in the past 5-6 yrs . A great company and always courteous when you need to call their office.
Thu Sep 15 2016 18:00:23 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: BAY CITY GALS

Thu Sep 15 2016 17:49:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kat Friebe
review: This place is so quint it has the feel of a traditional cabin but with a modern twist. You immediately feel right at home the minute you walked in the door. And everything you need is right at hand just bring your food. It's listed as a two bedroom but has a small room off the back with a single bed that can be used as a 3rd bedroom which is nice. The kitchen is a great place to gather with family and friends along the modern high top table with cute little stools. The fire pit outside is a great place gather and enjoy each other company. They also have a cute little patio area outside with table

umbrella and grill which is so convenient. Your not directly on the water but can see the water from some of the large windows facing the Lake! Just a short little walk down to the water edge which is beautiful and the neighbors are all very friendly. Just a short drive to the marina and boot rentals for a day on the water and Tawas City is not to far and have great restaurants
quaint shops and weekly events going on all summer long. We felt very at home and love this place
we have recommended it to some of our friends already
we will definitely be back!
Thu Sep 15 2016 17:49:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Best Labor Day Weekend!

Thu Sep 15 2016 16:31:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Violet Harris
Thu Sep 15 2016 16:31:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We stay here with family and it was perfect. Offered a great view of the lake and we had such a nice time. Will be comming back next year.
Thu Sep 15 2016 16:31:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Wonderful cottage

Thu Sep 15 2016 13:01:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Brian McVeigh
Thu Sep 15 2016 13:01:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We have rented both sides of this cottage many times and really enjoy the area and the property.
Thu Sep 15 2016 13:01:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Pleasant Stay

Thu Sep 15 2016 11:52:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Nichole Noonan
Thu Sep 15 2016 11:52:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Perfect rental for a couple or small family. It had everything we needed. Very quiet. Nice and clean. Short walk down to the beach. Great price. Would definitely stay there again.
title: At Peace
Oscoda
MI

Thu Sep 15 2016 00:31:43 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathleen Friebe
review: My family and I have spent vacations in Au Gres Michigan for 45 years and this is one of the most beautiful places we have ever stayed at. You are so close to the water edge and the sunrises are just breathtaking while the moon coming up over the water at night is so beautiful it almost looks unreal. One night we even enjoyed our own personal fireworks as we watched the lightning storm dance across the sky! The condo itself is absolutely beautiful with a very open floor plan
beautiful furniture and large windows with a great view to enjoy beautiful Lake Huron. Not only do you have access to the lake you also have the convenience of a pool
hot tub and an outdoor fire pit which we spent many nights as a family sitting and talking the night away while listening to the waves roll in
absolutely so peaceful. You are close enough to Tawas to enjoy great food
shopping and you can always count on some type of festivities going on. This was definitely a little slice of heaven that we were able to enjoy for a week
we are already anticipating next year's visit and are planning on extending our stay for just a little longer .
Thu Sep 15 2016 00:31:43 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Whitestone's perfect get away!

Wed Sep 14 2016 23:55:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Dawn Woidan
review: Scott and I enjoyed our stay at Whitestone Bay. The unit was large and roomy. Very clean
pool and hot tub was an awesome plus. The view was amazing. We loved the covered patio area. Would stay again in a heartbeat. Perfect Landing was again a fast
friendly and easy way to book our vacation. Keep up the good work !!!!
Wed Sep 14 2016 23:55:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Whitestone Bay Unit 104

There needs to be some updates on carpet - why is in outside on the screened porch? And bathrooms had towel racks falling off & mold in corners. Blinds on the front windows to help with keeping the front rooms cool would be appreciated. No AC was tough at night and the house warmed up very quickly. Lots of dusty clutter. A good cleaning of the kitchen would be wonderful as everything felt greasy during warm summer months. The beach was amazing and neighbors were friendly. The grass and shade was a huge bonus.

Wed Sep 14 2016 17:05:50 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Sail inn

Tue Sep 13 2016 20:42:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sandra Raymond
review: We've stayed here several times. Our early-twenties kids love it. All of the fun of a cottage with none of the maintenance to do. It's a quirky little place
but that is part of it's charm! I see that on another review that the living room furniture is uncomfortable. It is
but I see that the response was that a furniture update is planned. There is no AC but plenty of electric fans
just the way cottages are meant to be. Enjoy all the amenities of the state park without having to camp there (it's a very short walk away). Nice quiet location
very few cars passing by.
Tue Sep 13 2016 20:42:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: home away from home

Tue Sep 13 2016 18:08:56 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Laura
Tue Sep 13 2016 18:08:56 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Perfect Landing was such a help to our family on this vacation! We were staying at a small resort in town and having a terrible time due to the conditions of the property. Perfect landing was able to find us a place within hours of placing a call to them. Steps to the city was a beautiful little place to stay in Tawas. A short walk to the beach and all the fun in the city right outside your door. The place was very very clean and the hot tub was an excellent addition to our vacation. I would highly recommend this place for anyone to stay. We would love to come back someday !!!!
Tue Sep 13 2016 18:08:56 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Very nice place to stay!!

Tue Sep 13 2016 18:05:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Callie mcdonnell
review: This home has wonderful potential. Excellent beach/yard. Screed porch is great. This place is in need of a serious cleaning. Big Windows looking out at Lake Huron could have been nice
but were very dirty. Kitchen layout is weird
needs lots of updating overall.
Tue Sep 13 2016 18:05:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great potential

Tue Sep 13 2016 16:13:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: SummerVacation
review: The location of Summer Breeze was fantastic. We have the cabins cleanliness 2 stars-it was very clean but unfortunately
the house itself was in major disrepair with wood rot in the exterior garage-not the best first impression. The interior of the cabin was quite lovely with its retro flair
many of the amenities showed severe wear

such as the microwave door had been burned so badly From what appeared to have caught fire that it penetrated through the door to the glass-we did not use it since it had shown a previous burn. The only shower drained slowly
and the towel rack was broken-it looked that there was an attempt to repair
but it would not hold towels. The exterior photos of the front and back yards were misleading as during our stay
the yard was overgrown
not maintained. There was no shower to rinse off after the lake and the walk through the overgrown yard. Very disappointed that the actual amenities did not reflect the description. None-the-less
we enjoyed the accessibility to the lake and the friendly neighbors.
title: Great Location
Major Wear
response: Hello all concerns will be addressed with Owners to assure in the future that everything is up to par for our guests. All amenities that are listed are what is at the property. We agree it would be nice for all Lake Huron properties to have an outdoor showers
but these properties are privately owned and not resort type
so we hope you enjoyed the privacy that this property offered. We will go over any concerns
with owners.

Tue Sep 13 2016 14:46:43 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jenny Schwab
review: We have rented this house for the same week in July for the past four summers and really like this location! We take our four grandchildren who love the beach and the fire pit and especially enjoy the screened porch when it rains. Their parents come for an occasional dinner and overnight visit and this house is big enough to accommodate everyone. It does get quite hot
though
so bring enough fans for each bedroom.The beds and linens could use some updating but overall this is a great spot for a beach getaway.
Tue Sep 13 2016 14:46:43 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Summer Wind is a Family Favorite!

Tue Sep 13 2016 14:46:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Lisa
Tue Sep 13 2016 14:46:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Great cabin it's 2nd time renting. It's so private you feel like it's your own beach front cabin. Will go back again and again. Loved the new mattresses!!
Tue Sep 13 2016 14:46:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great cabin

Tue Sep 13 2016 14:12:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathleen K
review: Perfect Landing is a great and very easy company to work with! For 2 years in a row we have booked one of your vacation homes. Natures Haven had the most beautiful beach
and Lake Huron was a hit with all of us. As far as the house
just a few issues. Cleanliness was an issue. Had to buy new shower curtain liner
the one there was full of mold. The water issue by wall and kitchen floor is really bad! Spongy floors by kitchen sink. Other than that
everything else was good. The sun and water kept us outside all weekend. Such a roomy place
no other issues!
Tue Sep 13 2016 14:12:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Natures Haven
response: Thank you for letting us know
owners had an ongoing issue that no one knew

there was a leak from an outside pipe that ran underneath the kitchen floor. The good news is that it is being redone and is blocked off the remainder of the year to assure it is all resolved (new floors and all) Hope to see you next year!

Tue Sep 13 2016 11:45:13 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rahnea Hindman
review: This location is perfect. You are about 3 minutes outside of town and it is set back behind a few trees and you can almost drive by without seeing it. 3 cabins sit on its own perfect little beach which has the most beautiful sunrises (I really recommend getting up at 7am and sitting on the beach in one of their many swings or picnic tables and watching the sunrise). We had a family of 4 and fit very comfortably and enjoyed our stay. There is a grill on every deck
a bonfire surrounded by benches for the evening
2 swings
2 picnic tables

and chairs on your own deck. Our only problem with our visit is that the air was not working. When we arrived it was 85 inside and many attempts to get the air going did not work. The morning after we checked in a lady that works for the company was in the next cabin working and we explained the situation (she was very nice) and she had maintenance out within a hour. he attempted to do what he could (apparantly previous tenants also had issues) but shortly after he left it was back up to 82 degrees. We had to keep windows open at night and we went and bought a fan just to try to stay cool. The shower is pretty small also......but the cabin truly is set up cute
it has everything you need and there is 2 grocery stores in town you can buy food at. Reading up on the rental it says to bring extra towels
etc....but we truly did not need anything at all. They keep it stocked with all the necessities. We will definately stay again
just hope the air situation is fixed before then (the tenants in the next cabin over also had problems with theirs).
Tue Sep 13 2016 11:45:13 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Perfect getaway spot
response: Air units are all set
to everyone\'s surprise as expensive as these units are (over $2
000 a piece) and only a year old

it took a bit to figure out what the issue was. The heating and plumbing service has been fixed and there will be notes up to further show guests that the settings have to remain at what they are set on to insure the best flow of air. What we do know is that they have all had service and do not expect any further concerns.

Sat Sep 10 2016 19:44:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Aubrey K
review: My friends and I had our 9th annual summer group trip at Sandy Beach Cottages this summer and it was awesome! We had friends fly-in/drive from all over the country; our stay at Sandy Beach Cottages was our favorite destination thus far. it's perfect for a large group (ours was 20). If the awesome private beach on Lake Erie isn't enough

there are several inland lakes near Sandy Beach Cottages for fishing boats. There's also a local golf course as well as plenty of grocery stores. We will definitely be re-booking with Sandy Beach Cottages next summer!
Sat Sep 10 2016 19:44:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Place For Large Group!

Fri Sep 09 2016 22:56:08 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Douglas
Fri Sep 09 2016 22:56:08 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: What was not disclosed was the fact that the cabin on the property was connected to another cabin and there was paper thin walls. The people that we roomed next to were very weird and unfriendly. We ended up Leaving a day early. While a nice location that one item should have been disclosed.
Fri Sep 09 2016 22:56:08 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Wasn't what we expected
Fri Sep 09 2016 22:56:08 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: Hello so sorry you were disappointing the description reads Sutton\'s Sunrise is one of two 466 square foot cabins on the same property and the photos both show two properties. It is a great property for those larger families that don\'t mind sharing. And so you are aware if you had any concerns about anything we may have been able to assist you had we known of your concerns. Hope you give us a try next year! I am sure we can find you a location that is not a shared beachfront.

Fri Sep 09 2016 13:33:15 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: mary bennett

Fri Sep 09 2016 12:43:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Abe

Fri Sep 09 2016 12:43:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: We loved it

Fri Sep 09 2016 08:34:25 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mo Dagher
review: Endless Summer is an absolutely beautiful home located directly on lake huron with a beach backyard. The home is very spacious
comfy
and clean. The raised deck is a great add-on and the beach accessories in the garage were awesome! Though there was a few webs and slight issues with the sliding doors
the overall stay was very pleasant and relaxing. I'm looking forward to visiting again next summer!!
Fri Sep 09 2016 08:34:25 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Endless Summer!!

Thu Sep 08 2016 14:49:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Renee Sellers
review: We loved being right on the beach! Perfect location! My only complaint is the condo unit itself. We had water leaking from the ceiling in the master bathroom. The shower curtains were dirty. The furniture
dishes

linens were all very run down (old) I expected a little better for the price we paid. Overall neighbors and location were great but the unit needs some upgrades and to fix the leak in the bathroom. We had to call numerous times during our stay and have the cleaning person come out twice. She was great but all that was done was cleaned up water and replaced towels. The ceiling kept leaking the entire time so we did not use that bathroom. I wouldn't stay in this particular unit again but the resort itself has some nice amenities.
Thu Sep 08 2016 14:49:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Beautiful beach
response: It is a great unit
unfortunately it was an issue with the condo upstairs that leaked into this unit. All has been resolved. We have noted your concerns. We assure you it is all taken care of.

Wed Sep 07 2016 19:14:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: nancy sherizen
review: we had a wonderful stay. The towels
linens
and pillows were of fine quality and cleanliness. The cottages were very clean upon on our arrival. Don't rely on the wifi connection. Plenty of chairs and umbrellas for the beach

lots of sand toys as well. Be prepared for lots of sand everywhere! That is why they called this rental: sandy beach cottages!!! It is difficult to keep the sand out of the units because the sand is all the way up to the cottage entrances! Magnificent sunrises
large sand bar for kids to play/swim.
Wed Sep 07 2016 19:14:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: customer

Tue Sep 06 2016 23:12:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Angela VanZytveld
review: We arrived at the house
the outside of the house was ok
but didn't look as nice as the pics. We entered the house to find that the floor was filthy
stained and hadn't even been vacuumed. Also
there were dead bugs all over the floor
dirty wash cloth in the sink
etc. We found the vacuum cleaner to start cleaning and it was clear that the bag had not been emptied in years
it was so full it would not pick up anything. So we emptied the bag and spent the next two hours cleaning the house. We took pics and contacted Perfect Landing to voice our concern
they were nice
although they only refunded our cleaning fee and left it at that. All in all we made the best of the weekend.
Tue Sep 06 2016 23:12:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Dissapointing

Tue Sep 06 2016 20:45:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Natalia Robinson
review: My whole family enjoyed the stay at Hurondezvous. The place was spacious and comfortable. The location was perfect for our long weekend stay. We took advantage of the pool table and bocce ball. Great place to relax and unwind. Kitchen was well stocked
our only issue in the kitchen is that there was no dish-washing detergent. We fortunately brought our own. We'd love to come back in the future and highly recommend for a group trip!
Tue Sep 06 2016 20:45:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great family fun!

Tue Sep 06 2016 18:33:52 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Nancy L
review: This vacation rental has some pros and cons. We rented all five cabin for five families for a M-F stay. It was nice to have the entire property to ourselves. Most of our party agreed this rental would be awkward with people you don't know staying in some of the cabins due to the configuration and the small beach. The property is relatively private. The cabins were very tidy and quite clean
with the exception of a few cobwebs here and there. The kitchens are small (no counter space in the 2-bedrooms)
except at the big house
but are well stocked with dishware and appliances (however
we had problems with several of the toasters). The furnishings are older and well-used
but overall the cabins seemed maintained and in reasonable condition

but definitely on the shabbier side. The common outdoor area is quite large and the fire pit is great. (Tip: one of our party contacted a local on Craigslist who delivered a load of firewood at a reasonable price
worked great). The beach was as-described
a little on the small side for spreading out in the sun
but the water was great and very shallow for a long way. On the downside
the double mattress in our cabin was terrrrible
which is a huge disappointment on vacation. The two bedroom cottages are really tight

with no place for bags in the 2nd bedroom with the trundle out. One thing that would enhance this property would be a shaded patio structure or a pergola. The weather was great but there is no place to get away from the sun on the property without going indoors. Would be nice to put the picnic tables on an even surface
as well. Lastly
they weren't kidding when they called this  Sandy Beach  because the sand is relentless. It goes pretty much up to the doorsteps of the cottages and is a little tough on the feet. However
basins are provided at each cottage so you can set up a little rinse station
which was handy. All in all
for the price
this was a decent place to stay.
Tue Sep 06 2016 18:33:52 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: They weren't kidding!

Tue Sep 06 2016 13:46:09 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: lori leblanc
review: My family and 2 dogs enjoyed an absolutely fabulous time at this cabin. The view and the sandy beach was everything we expected. The air conditioner worked fine circulating air for comfortable sleeping. The fenced in area provided a safe environment for our dogs considering the home was so close to the highway. Once on the beach
all you heard was the splashing of waves from Lake Huron. We plan to stay again next year. Thanks for sharing your place with us!
Tue Sep 06 2016 13:46:09 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Time at Nature's Haven

Mon Sep 05 2016 20:38:55 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mary Hewson
review: We had a wonderful 4 days and nights at Lazy Dayz. The beach was great with so much room for sandcastles
flying kites and hanging out. Plenty of room for all eleven of us inside for sleeping and playing games at night. It was warmer weather during our time there in July
so we did miss that there was no air conditioning. We are hoping to come back next July and many years to come. Definitely would recommend at a stay at Lazy Dayz!
Mon Sep 05 2016 20:38:55 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Beach was wonderful

Sun Sep 04 2016 13:02:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Pete londeau

Sat Sep 03 2016 18:59:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Last minute family vacation

Sat Sep 03 2016 16:34:31 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Nancy Hunt
review: Came back again this past July......we had a wonderful time one again! So relaxing and quiet.....We will be back next summer! Thank you for sharing your home with us

just me and some ducks...perfect!

review: Really needed an air conditioner. Bathroom was so small you would have to turn sideways to get into the shower. Water came out completely brown at first. Could see through the cracks in the bathroom walls. Furniture was old and grubby. Really
really need updating! Very frustrating not having anyone in the area to help. Took long time to get problems resolved. The lake is beautiful
although stoney. Very peaceful setting.

review: Ah
the view! Such a wonderful yard to relax in! The beach is quiet and we enjoyed a swim during the day and a bonfire at night. Being on a bluff
it's a bit of a climb back up
but it provides a spectacular view. Lots of lawn furniture
bonfire wood
games
kitchen utensils--everything to make our stay comfortable and homey. We've already made our reservation for next year!
Sat Sep 03 2016 11:44:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Truly a Grand View!

Sat Sep 03 2016 01:37:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Dave
review: Overall the Grand View 5 was okay

but it really needs some TLC. The walls of the shower unit were broken and the whole unit needs to be replaced. There are major cracks in the exterior walls around the cinder blocks and you could see daylight through the cracks. The beds were way too firm for a comfortable sleep. The air conditioner unit was useless and the fans provided were so loud it was difficult to sleep. The unit was very clean
the deck was nice and there was a dishwasher! Also on the positive side the lake is beautiful and the cabins are really in a beautiful spot on the lake. The resort is located in a great area
between Alpena and Rogers City. The area offers a lot to do and we really enjoyed exploring. There are a couple of row boats for use
however
only one had two working oars and it leaked. All in all
we had a good time and would like to stay in the area again. There would have to be some improvements for us to consider staying at Grand View 5 again.

Fri Sep 02 2016 23:00:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This was one of the best vacation stays in the Oscoda area yet. I would love to visit next year for the full week I plan to book in advance. It is like a diamond hidden in the trees perfect location near everything yet you feel like you're miles away. Love love love the washer and dryer the kitchen is much nicer than it looks in the pictures.! Very organized.! The water is also amazing beautiful clear and a very Sandy Bottom. The only thing I would suggest is a full length mirror in one of the bedrooms or behind a door other than that everything was perfect and very peaceful
Fri Sep 02 2016 23:00:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Perfect and Peaceful

Fri Sep 02 2016 21:23:09 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cheryl Bongiorno
review: My family had a great experience at Lazy Dayz! The beach is amazing
and was our favorite part. It was a very hot week
so we wish it had air conditioning
but during the day we could go swimming. We found it clean and comfortable for our group of 13 and a newborn. We loved the large living room
and walking distance to get ice cream! The television is very small for that large room
and the picnic table in the kitchen is very snug. But
you can eat outside or at the table in the living room. We would definitely go back!
Fri Sep 02 2016 21:23:09 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: LazyDayz

Fri Sep 02 2016 20:26:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This cottage is set in a beautiful location with the sandy beach just 30 steps away! The view is gorgeous and the cottage is cozy! This is one of the nicer furnished cottages that I have rented and I can't tell you how much we appreciated the clean comfortable furniture!!!! The extra counter space in the kitchen and the bench seating in the dining area was a highlight for us as it made each meal enjoyable and a pleasure to cook! We usually book with Perfect Landing and we haven't been disappointed yet!
Fri Sep 02 2016 20:26:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Gorgeous Setting and Beautiful Cottage!!!!!

Fri Sep 02 2016 19:20:13 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Beverly Thornburg
review: We very much enjoyed our stay at this house! The view of Lake Huron was just magnificent! What a wonderful view first light in the morning with a cup of coffee! The house was very roomy for the 6 of us.. Nice furniture and the beds were fairly comfortable. The washer and dryer were a nice amenity! The kitchen was very nice. We found the house otherwise very clean and welcoming. We didn't mind the 30 steps to the beach! Good exercise. The beach was wonderful...white and sandy and the provided beach chairs were welcomed! The water was beautiful blue. Our suggestion would be to bring fans...as it was very hot when we arrived in July...and there is no air conditioning
So glad we brought them! However
we would definitely stay here again! The check in proccess was easy and Perfect Landing was always gracious and accommodating.
Fri Sep 02 2016 19:20:13 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Wonderful stay

Fri Sep 02 2016 16:28:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: ed dluzynski
review: A few issues with dirty laundry in washer at check-in
torn screens on a couple of doors and wastebaskets that needed emptying. Nice spot
very peaceful. Would recommend the rental.
Fri Sep 02 2016 16:28:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: A Nice Spot
Fri Sep 02 2016 16:28:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: So sorry if you had any issues at all the screens were scheduled for repair just not many openings to complete but it has since been completed. We spoke direct to the independent contractor to assure they do not miss that again. It is a great spot to vacation!

Fri Sep 02 2016 16:12:01 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mary Pilcher
review: It's true
this is an older house without all of the glamour
but we thoroughly enjoyed our family vacation here! There were beautiful sunrises

and moonrises! Campfires every night took us back to our camping days! (but with the bathroom MUCH closer!) There was room for our ball players to have a nightly ball game (boys vs girls) and those who played corn hole had plenty of room for the fierce competition. An extra beverage refrigerator in the shed was a god send
and the cooler evenings by the water were refreshing. One of our better family vacations without the worry about the younger kids  making a mess
and the selection of Sponge Bob movies hit the right group! Ages 74-6 years of age all had a wonderful time!

Fri Sep 02 2016 14:46:52 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Patricia Thornberry

Fri Sep 02 2016 14:46:52 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Ms.

Fri Sep 02 2016 14:40:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Todd Decatur
review: The place and location were amazing! Loved all the amenities available to us and the walk-out to the beach was great. The multiple beds were very comfortable. If I had to say one thing to improve it would be the wicker living room furniture
obviously had a nice cabin feel
but just a little uncomfortable. All in all
the I would come back again in a heart beat!
Fri Sep 02 2016 14:40:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Place!

Fri Sep 02 2016 14:26:25 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kristen Purrington
review: We stayed at Just Chillin with a total of 5 adults and 4 kids under the age of 5
and the house/location/beach exceeded our expectations. It was very spacious with plenty of room for the kids to play indoors and out on the deck and yard. The house was super clean
the kitchen was well stocked with cookware
there was wood for the fire pit
and lots of other little details that made our stay easy & comfortable. If it's going to be very hot/humid during your stay

plan to bring some high powered fans because the upstairs does get stuffy. There are plenty of ceiling/tabletop fans but they can only do so much. The AC on the main floor does a surprisingly good job of cooling the space downstairs. We also LOVED the beach. It was clean
quiet
private
and had very nice sand (my previous experiences with lake Huron beaches were always much rockier and colder!). Lots of stuff to do in the area (Tawas is a short drive away
lots of antique stores). I would definitely come back with my family again!
Fri Sep 02 2016 14:26:25 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Perfect House Up North

Thu Sep 01 2016 22:00:43 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kimberley Korba

but overall
it's great.

Kayaked

the living room furniture is uncomfortable
so I'm happy they will update it. I will be back next year probably.

TX

review: What a beautiful place. Wish our stay could have been longer. A boat dock would have been nice

Mon Aug 29 2016 17:28:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Paulette Brown
review: I had a wonderful time here. It definitely was a great trip .It was everything that was advertised
everything was clean and nice. The neighbor's was very kind and friendly. Beautiful view of lake. Just an overall nice stay. .. Thank you!! Paulette Brown
Mon Aug 29 2016 17:28:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Happy Camper
Mon Aug 29 2016 17:28:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: So happy you had a great time!

Sun Aug 28 2016 02:01:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cary Austin
Sun Aug 28 2016 02:01:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This was our first time here and it was fantastic! Weather and beach were perfect and the view was breath-taking! I'm a business owner so rarely do i get to take a full week off but this place met our expectations and really helped me to" recharge" my batteries! To kind of explain my ratings I have to say only a couple things were negative. Today is our last day and it rained and we went to the screened in porch but it was leaking pretty bad from the two skylights. Secondly when we got here we found one of the beds still had sheets with spots of some recent "activity". I realize thats a cleaning oversight but it is one that can create a negative cleaning impression. The screened porch also had a slider door with ripped screen and no handle. These are small things and nothing is ever as perfect as we all like. The comfort...location and gorgeous beach and view far surpassed those negatives. I plan on booking to return here....Love it!!
Sun Aug 28 2016 02:01:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Looking forward to booking next year!!

review: This place was great for a multi family get together and play in beautiful northern Michigan. All the amenities you need for a great vacation. Ample parking
kitchen supplies
outdoor grill
seating
wi-fi
beautiful clean

sandy beach. Earlier in the season the walleye fishing is great. We tubed the Au Sable river which is a 45 minute drive north. Highly recommend that! Was great to unwind and relax. A good distance from the road through the trees so all you can hear is lake Huron crashing! Enjoyed the fire pit on the beach at night.
title: Ahhh
relax with the crashing waves!

Sat Aug 27 2016 12:29:53 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Barbara Beyer

review: I did not stay here. It was rented for 7 family members who could not be accommodated in my home with the other visiting familiy members. Four of the five adults were pleased with their accommodations. The fifth was not. He noted cobwebs and unacceptable bedding and towels. Then

the old TV blew out during the Olympics which added to his negative assessment. It was quickly replaced the next day with a nice new one for all future renters to enjoy. My assessment? For the most part

this property is perhaps one of the nicest rentals to be had in this area of Lake Huron. I would choose it again but would like to see the covering on the sofa bed in the main living area sanitized and cleaned.

as quickly as the TV was remedied we would have quickly remedied any other concern as well. Happy the majority enjoyed it! It is a great place for sure!

The neighborhood was very quite and my grandkids loved the easy access to the lake. We had to drag them out because it was getting dark. The only downside is the small bathroom with 7 people. Growing up in the area I knew it would be much cooler out at the point and the lake breeze was a blessing.
Fri Aug 26 2016 16:24:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Week
Fri Aug 26 2016 16:24:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: So glad to hear your enjoying one of the best beaches around! Cozy cove is perfect for that short distance to the point. Thank you for renting through Perfect Landing!
