review: This was the fourth year my husband and I rented this property. I certainly can say that we enjoyed the peace and quiet that this property provided. The week we rented in July had no neighbors on either side of us. However
it was hard to get into the lake to do any swimming. We enjoyed the peaceful evenings by the fire pit
and listening to the waves.
Fri Aug 26 2016 01:11:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: mrs
response: Dancing with Waves used to have a beach access to the water now due to the decay of the waters edge it was modified to save the shoreline. It will be remaining this way. Lake Huron as beautiful as it is it is also very rough on docks and shorelines in rough weather. Luckily the public beach is not far away
and you have a great view and breeze to enjoy! Thank you!

Wed Aug 24 2016 21:43:37 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Aneta
review: My boyfriend and I decided to go here for a 4 day get away. It was amazing. The sun sets
the sunrises
the sound of the crashing waves. It was great! I highly recommend this house. We are even thinking about going again next year.
Wed Aug 24 2016 21:43:37 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Amazing!!

Wed Aug 24 2016 18:19:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Malack Boussi
Wed Aug 24 2016 18:19:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We had an amazing time.. The scenery of the water was stunning! The only thing we didn't like was it was too hard to get into the water from all the sharp rocks. But our overall experience was absolutely amazing. It was so peaceful and relaxing.
Wed Aug 24 2016 18:19:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Beautiful

Wed Aug 24 2016 17:43:07 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Keith
review: Great place to stay. Spacious yard on the riverfront
including fire pit and grill area. Nice back porch. Great views.
Wed Aug 24 2016 17:43:07 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great place to stay

Tue Aug 23 2016 13:05:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Dave and Lisa Halliday
Tue Aug 23 2016 13:05:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We were able to book this cottage at the last minute as our previous plans had fallen through.....as it turns out it was a blessing. The cottage is well laid out and very relaxing. The beach is a short walk away and you get to meet some of the neighbours as you make your way there :0) Away from the cottage and the beach there are too many things near by to do. We found the entire area of Tawas to be amazing. It was a great stay! Dave and LIsa Halliday
Tue Aug 23 2016 13:05:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great place to unwind and relax :0)

Mon Aug 22 2016 20:36:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Susan Haagen
Mon Aug 22 2016 20:36:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: I brought my family to this property this summer. The view and lot was amazing. We had a great back patio to sit and eat or just enjoy Lake Huron. The fire pit at the beach was wonderful to sit and enjoy the stars and the sound of the waves. The kitchen was well stocked for our short stay. The inside was a little cramped and small dining area but we mostly ate outside.
Mon Aug 22 2016 20:36:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great View!

Mon Aug 22 2016 16:12:14 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Randy Lyons
Mon Aug 22 2016 16:12:14 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: The cottage is well kept and clean. The location is great and we really enjoyed the spacious deck. The kitchen is well stocked and the beds are comfortable. The beach just down the street is nice and the state park beach is a not to far away. A very relaxing and enjoyable place to stay
Mon Aug 22 2016 16:12:14 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Beautiful Cottage

Mon Aug 22 2016 13:04:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jim English
review: This is the 4th consecutive year our family has vacationed here. We absolutely love the location
sandy beach
and friendly neighbors. I don't usually complain
but this year we do have a few issues about the cleaning service. When we arrived

there were spider webs and some dust. There also were a lot of houseflies throughout. Most of the towels were not in linen closet--they were stacked on the dryer and on a table near the dryer. The first time we used the stove
the smoke detector was set off because of smoke from the excessive amount food debris under the burners that was not cleaned. The sliding screen door in the kitchen could not be opened

the rollers were completely inoperable. Also the screen was taped up because the screen was ripped. We had to call to complain and a repairman came and replaced the door the next morning. When I pay a cleaning fee as part of the price
I expect all items to be in place and in operating order. Otherwise
it was a great family experience. We will come again next year.
Mon Aug 22 2016 13:04:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Mr.
response: Thank you for bringing it to our attention
we were happy to get things remedied right away for you. We also met with the independent cleaning contractor to assure there will be no future incident
we certainly would have had them come back out to remedy that day. Endless summer has such a great atmosphere for sure!

Sat Aug 20 2016 13:20:53 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Chris PW
Sat Aug 20 2016 13:20:53 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Wonderful house feels like home. Clean and has everything you need. Great neighborhood and location. Will come back again!
Sat Aug 20 2016 13:20:53 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Cozy Cove

Fri Aug 19 2016 23:21:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Diane
review: Had a great week with family. The lake was perfect for our little (6
and 6 months) grandkids. The house itself was very spacious and comfortable
the only thing that would have been nice is more closet hang up space
and pillows for a couple of the beds.
Fri Aug 19 2016 23:21:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Perfect week
Fri Aug 19 2016 23:21:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: New pillows already purchased and placed in the home you will be all set next year :) Happy to have you stay!

Fri Aug 19 2016 16:05:01 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kevin Ellerbrock
review: We had a good time here but it would be nice to have had Internet. The beds do need replaced
everyone in the group commentated on this . We would like to see a fence along river to prevent grand kids from possibly falling into river. All in all a great place to stay we love Oscoda.
Fri Aug 19 2016 16:05:01 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: AuSable River Mist

Fri Aug 19 2016 14:04:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cathy Hanley
review: What a wonderful time we had. There were 20 of us and it was just perfect. From the beach for the kids to make sand castles
to the swimming
bike riding
campfires

we had a ball. This was a time for all of my sisters family and mine to get together and the cousins to keep in touch. Everything we needed was provided so the need to pack everything but the kitchen sink was alleviated. An easy
restful
peaceful vacation that was much needed. Thanks again for making our vacation a great time.
Fri Aug 19 2016 14:04:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Brown's Willow Beach

Thu Aug 18 2016 20:06:25 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kay Family
review: This was our first time at Cedar Lake Haven

and it won't be our last. We have already submitted a temporary request for next year! The home is even more lovely in person. The property is immaculate inside and out. We had a great vacation! The only thing that would make it even more perfect
would be the ability to rent a pontoon or jet ski on Cedar Lake...guess we will just have to bring one with us next year!
Thu Aug 18 2016 20:06:25 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Picture Perfect!

Wed Aug 17 2016 20:38:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Renee Tocco
review: A group of long time friends have been going on  girls weekend  for 20 years now
and we finally found our perfect getaway in Oscoda. Everything was just as described
very nice
clean
accommodating
quiet
spacious
packed with everything you would need as far as kitchen supplies. Comfortable bedding
seating at bonfire and beach chairs provided! We will definitely be back and also recommending this place to others. Thank you for a perfect weekend!
Wed Aug 17 2016 20:38:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: BEAUTY AND THE BEACH STAY!

Wed Aug 17 2016 20:19:15 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Joe Axe
review: We were able to free up time at the last moment
and luckily this place was available

although it was not a perfect location for us as we were about 35 minutes from our river trip. We had a party of 6 adults (our kids are grown now) for a long weekend. The unit was very nicely furnished and equipped as we did not seem to want for anything other than regular tv (the Olympics were on and the tv just had Apple TV). All the essentials were provided including coffee
tea

etc. You could feel the history in the house and we enjoyed some of the very old woodwork. It had a lot of charm. The unit also had a very nice handicap ramp\parking which was a surprise as my wife had recently had surgery and was so happy to have such a short walk and no steps. The only complaint that most in the party had was the noise from the individuals on the 2nd floor very early in the morning. I was able to fix this with an extra beer at night and some ear plugs. If you are a good sleeper this may not bother you. This is a very beautiful area

just not perfect for our plans. I will attempt to include my own sunrise photo's that I took while there...it was worth getting up for a few minutes. We had a very nice stay and will definitely return
and I don't think anyone will be disappointed.
Wed Aug 17 2016 20:19:15 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Long Weekend Stay

Wed Aug 17 2016 14:07:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: kate zimnikci
review: This was a great place to have the whole family come for a week. At first I was afraid that we would spend all of our time driving to Tawas State Park
but the access to both of these smaller lakes was ideal! Loved the fishing off of the dock
the use of the canoe was an unexpected plus
sand pit and outdoor play equipment
Sand Lake was great for small kids too. The property is so nice to walk around too. The house was one of the nicest that I have ever see as far as rentals go - lots of toys and books
a pool table
well equipped kitchen
clean... Would certainly recommend to anyone
Wed Aug 17 2016 14:07:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great place

Wed Aug 17 2016 08:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Ashley
review: My family and I ( we have an infant
toddler

and a teen) stayed here for 3 amazing nights it was so peaceful and beautiful. We spent a lot of our time fishing. The location was also perfect so close to everything! It was so romantic my boyfriend proposed on the dock right under the giant williow tree! This home will always have a special place in our heatys

and we will be staying there again and again. The only small complaint I have was that the hot tub was broken and we didn't know until we checked in and found a note. I would reccomend everyone to stay here.
Wed Aug 17 2016 08:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Amazing
Wed Aug 17 2016 08:53:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: Oh my goodness congratulations on the proposal! It is a great place for sure :) The hot tub was addressed and it all set. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay!

Wed Aug 17 2016 05:41:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Crystal leverenz
Wed Aug 17 2016 05:41:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Beautiful place to stay! Great location! Wish we could have stayed longer! Will definitely book this house again in the future.
Wed Aug 17 2016 05:41:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Perfect little vacation

Wed Aug 17 2016 00:14:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Karen
review: Very comfortable throughout.Turned on fans and opened windows to air out but fine after a couple hours. Nice
quiet neighborhood. We walked and rode bikes to state park. Fire pit not useable
so a bit disappointed. Would come here again and would recommend it to friends.
Wed Aug 17 2016 00:14:16 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Nice!
response: Hello! It is a great location
Had we known you had a concern of the fire pit we could have taken care of it ASAP for you rest assured it will be all set going forward.

Tue Aug 16 2016 22:23:55 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Angela Wilson
review: This beach house was the perfect size for us and super comfortable! All rooms were spacious and clean. This cozy A-frame is located on a beautiful and very quiet beach. Plus you are close to downtown
ice cream
grocery
gas and beautiful state parks.
Tue Aug 16 2016 22:23:55 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Perfect Stay

Tue Aug 16 2016 21:25:14 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Irene Ducharme
review: We have an awesome stay
wish it could have been longer. There was plenty of room for everyone and the weather was excellent. I would stay at again without a second thought. Irene
Tue Aug 16 2016 21:25:14 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Irene

Tue Aug 16 2016 21:00:41 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Amber Fudacz
review: We recently stayed here while in town for a wedding. This home is very inviting and comfortable. The 2 living rooms is such a great feature. My husband loved getting up and fishing right out back after we watched the sun rise up over the river from our bed... Need I say more? :) Hot tub
pet friendly and all the amenities you could ask for. We will be back!
Tue Aug 16 2016 21:00:41 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Perfect Getaway

Tue Aug 16 2016 20:38:45 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathleen Herbert
review: Great vacation

very chic Beach House with all the comforts of home. Great location near shopping in Twas to sight seeing in Oscoda...right on the Sandy beach watching the sunrise & sunsets every day was breath taking..I would recommend this place to anyone who loves the sand
sun & fun.
Tue Aug 16 2016 20:38:45 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Fun in the sun

Tue Aug 16 2016 20:24:43 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Aaron Young
review: This place was the perfect size for my immediate family (myself
wife
and 2 young children). The beach was very clean and the property was maintained well. If I had to give suggestions for upgrades they would be to add wifi
maybe a larger TV
larger shower
more towels
and finally a hose outside to wash the sand off your feet before going in the house. Even better

it would have been nice to have an outdoor shower along the boardwalk that we could have used to rinse all the sand off! I love the beach (obviously from my choice to stay at this location)although it was a constant battle to keep the sand outside. I feel my recommendations are minor in the grand scheme of things. This was a great place to get away. Only a short dive in either direction to Tawas or Oscoda. I'll be back for sure.
Tue Aug 16 2016 20:24:43 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Place for the price

Tue Aug 16 2016 19:48:12 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathleen
review: What a cute chic Beach House..we stayed in July 2016
the place was clean
cozy & well stocked with everything. Waking up to beautiful sunrises & sunsets daily

right on the beautiful beach of the Huron River. There was plenty of sight seeing & shopping in Twas and a very nice grocery store called Roger's in Oscoda. I would recommend this place to everyone...sand
water
sun The place to stay is Beach House 1 ????
Tue Aug 16 2016 19:48:12 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Boardwalk Beach House 1

Tue Aug 16 2016 18:14:40 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Michelle Riley
Tue Aug 16 2016 18:14:40 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Pros- Great beach location. Clean property. Cons- No cable and no discount due to no cable Uncomfortable bed.
Tue Aug 16 2016 18:14:40 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Beach Vacation
response: So sorry you had any issues at all
it was the holiday weekend and a 4 night stay it was unfortunate that charter (cable) moves at there own speed. Not always in time frames we prefer. We we do what we can as fast as we can
just some things are out of anyone\'s control. Hope you decide to come again!

Tue Aug 16 2016 18:11:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Michelle A. Graves
review: Everything about this holiday was perfect. The cottage was clean
well stocked
comfortable furniture
outdoor grilling
wonderful gathering spots
and very private beach (especially noticeable when walking further down in either direction). Staff were always helpful with questions or requests. I will definitely be back.
Tue Aug 16 2016 18:11:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: board walk treehouse #2

Sat Aug 13 2016 15:33:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Linda
Sat Aug 13 2016 15:33:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Loved the cottage feel of the place and the location! Nice to have a private beach for the price. Would like to make this a yearly event!
Sat Aug 13 2016 15:33:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Spot
Sat Aug 13 2016 15:33:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: Please do! It is an awesome place book early! Thank you for being a great guest!

Thu Aug 11 2016 16:59:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: michelle johnson
Thu Aug 11 2016 16:59:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: thought it was one of the best cabins i've ever stayed at! very clean and comfortable. the beach was very relaxing and met some neighbors that were so friendly! had everything we needed....will definitely be back!! Thank you!
Thu Aug 11 2016 16:59:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: wonderful getaway
Thu Aug 11 2016 16:59:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: Your welcome! See you next year!

Tue Aug 09 2016 22:40:46 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sandra Raymond
review: We've stayed here several times. It's a quirky little place
but that is part of it's charm! I see that on another review there was mention that the living room furniture is uncomfortable. It is
but I see that the response was that a furniture update is planned. There is no AC
but again
that is part of it's charm. Plenty of electric fans
just the way cottages are meant to be. Enjoy all the amenities of the state park without having to camp there (it's a very short walk away). Nice quiet location
very few cars passing by.
Tue Aug 09 2016 22:40:46 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Cozy

Mon Aug 08 2016 18:46:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Andy Jarvis
review: We had another great week at Eaton's Cottage. House is perfect for a large group
and the price is right. Beach is beautiful!
Mon Aug 08 2016 18:46:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Another Great Week!

Sun Aug 07 2016 21:53:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Andrea Cushman
review: Four retired teachers enjoyed their week together. Cottage was very comfortable. It had everything we needed. Great deck to enjoy your morning coffee and for those who want to stay out of the sun. Nice sandy beach for sunning and playing. Our weather wasn't great
but you can't predict that. Had it been hot we would probably liked to have central air. But they have a number of fans available to help out. We'd recommend this all interested.
Sun Aug 07 2016 21:53:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Relaxing Retreat

Sat Aug 06 2016 21:22:51 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Chandra Spampanato
Sat Aug 06 2016 21:22:51 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We enjoyed the very clean cottage. The weather was great except for one day. It was so hot we needed an air conditioner. Imagine my surprise when there was not even a window unit to use and the inside temp was 82*. That was the only down side. We spent a lot of great family time with our family who live just up the street????. The cottage had everything we needed to cook family meals and treats. In the evening we watched deer cross through the yard. We went into town for the 4th of July parade and to watch fireworks at the beach. Looking forward to our next trip.
Sat Aug 06 2016 21:22:51 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Vacation during the 4th

Sat Aug 06 2016 21:22:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Chandra Spampanato
Sat Aug 06 2016 21:22:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We enjoyed the very clean cottage. The weather was great except for one day. It was so hot we needed an air conditioner. Imagine my surprise when there was not even a window unit to use and the inside temp was 82*. That was the only down side. We spent a lot of great family time with our family who live just up the street????. The cottage had everything we needed to cook family meals and treats. In the evening we watched deer cross through the yard. We went into town for the 4th of July parade and to watch fireworks at the beach. Looking forward to our next trip.
Sat Aug 06 2016 21:22:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Vacation during the 4th

Sat Aug 06 2016 17:38:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cheryl Hawkins
review: We had a great time
neighbors and owner was awesome! We hope to go back and stay there next year also!!!!!!
Sat Aug 06 2016 17:38:39 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great time!

Sat Aug 06 2016 17:16:55 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Robert Debone
Sat Aug 06 2016 17:16:55 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Overall good experience. First time in Tawas area. Will return to vacation in that city. The cottage was located right next to the state park which was nice. My only disappointment was due to the photos available on the site that I booked from. The photos made it look like the property was located right on the beach with its own walkway right to the water. That wasnt the case however. Instead we didnt even find out about the path in the photo until our last day. The neighbor saw us and told us we could cut through another person in the areas yard to access that path to the water in the photo. I wish we had known about it the whole trip. Also none of the photos I saw showed how close other homes actually were to you. Besides all that it was a great experience and I would recommend to others.
Sat Aug 06 2016 17:16:55 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Good Time
response: Hello so sorry to hear that the site you were on didn\'t show enough photos for you. It is best to search on perfect landing site as we have at least 12-16 photos per property. The description reads: Located on Tawas Point
just a stroll around to Tawas Point State Park.. And we are not aware of going through another property at all

as you have to go around to the Tawas Point to go into the park. We are here 24/7 and are happy to assist you with any questions you have at all. We appreciate the feedback on the photos and will make sure there is one of the surrounding area for future guests. Hope Sunrise is your choice for next year as well :)

Sat Aug 06 2016 17:16:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Billie McCarty
Sat Aug 06 2016 17:16:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Perfect for Sisters Getaway. Very charming and roomy for four adults. The beach and swimming area is so close! The house is furnished quite nice and the kitchen well stocked. We hope to return next summer!
Sat Aug 06 2016 17:16:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Fantastic

Wed Aug 03 2016 20:10:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Gina
review: This little house near the light house makes a great get-away spot. This is a good spot for our family of 2 kids and 2 adults. I like that the back yard
while small
it is private. The house has kind of an awkward layout

but overall it's a nice vacation house. The only few things that were a down side for us: 1) it was that it was always at least 10 degrees hotter inside than out during our stay in mid-July - thank goodness for the ceiling fans and the stand up fans in the bedrooms! 2) The living room furniture is VERY uncomfortable - I hope they plan on updating soon and 3) The ceiling in the living room was full of cracks - I was afraid of a big thunderstorm bringing it down. The upsides asides of this place are 1) the location 2) the neatness of the house
3) Wi-Fi availability
4) private back yard and 5) the price. With all of this
we will still consider renting it again next year!
Wed Aug 03 2016 20:10:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Cute & Cozy
Wed Aug 03 2016 20:10:54 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. As with any older homes you will find some cracks no worries the roof is solid. We have made note about the furniture and the good news is that updates are in the works. It is a great location and just a short distance from the water. See you next year!

Wed Aug 03 2016 00:19:40 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Paula
review: Yearly trip back home. No wifi- just the beach
bikes and the Bay. Quiet adult neighborhood.
Wed Aug 03 2016 00:19:40 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Escape back home

Sun Jul 31 2016 23:43:25 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jayne and Wayne Evans
review: This is our fourth year here with our family(8) we love this beach house
has everything that our family loves.We will be back come next summer.Everything is just a vacationers dream. Thanks so much.
Sun Jul 31 2016 23:43:25 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Our stay at the beach house!

Sat Jul 30 2016 06:05:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Ronna
review: We came to Michigan for our daughter's wedding. It was the perfect place to stay! It was very clean
roomy
quiet
and all of our family could stay together! The location is fantastic and we enjoyed the view of the river!
Sat Jul 30 2016 06:05:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Amazing place to stay!

Fri Jul 29 2016 11:05:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Tim Watkins
review: Owner was very nice person and offered to help us with anything we need. Accommodations were nice
clean
and comfortable. Appliances
wifi and TV worked great. We stayed during the early spring
so we didn't venture into the lake. But it looked nice. Overall
I would stay at Socrates Place again.
Fri Jul 29 2016 11:05:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Socrates Place
response: Wonderful we are so happy you had a great time
and you were fortunate to meet the owner. Perfect Landing is always here to help. Since you stayed in the spring you should see it now
many more updates.

Fri Jul 29 2016 02:05:51 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Ali ghabris
review: All I can say that if you looking to relax

enjoy a beautiful sunset and bonfire at night after a long day of swimming this would be the perfect place the house was very nicely furnished all you need is to bring your food and the owners were extremely welcoming and nice they always available and very helpful me and my family really enjoyed our stay and we will go back again
Fri Jul 29 2016 02:05:51 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Mr

Fri Jul 29 2016 12:49:15 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: WSinNS
review: This place is amazing!! My spouse and I came with our daughter. When we first pulled up there was a welcome sign with our names on it
to clearly mark we were at the right spot. When we walked inside there was a personalized card with a homemade cake
which was very yummy and thoughtful! It was very clean
supplied with everything needed
and the owners were very helpful with helping us find things we needed. They were super friendly
and even offered to take us for a spin on their boat. We will definitely be back!!! If you need a place to stay
this is the spot!
Fri Jul 29 2016 12:49:15 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: This place is amazing!!

Sun Jul 24 2016 14:37:47 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Robert Fournier
review: Great location for bike riding
beautiful beach and swimming and place is super cute. Really loved the screened in porch. Would definitely visit again!
Sun Jul 24 2016 14:37:47 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Real Cozy is a Winner!

Sat Jul 16 2016 23:16:34 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Linda Jackson
review: We had a fabulous time at Fond Memories. We has 8 people in our group and we were pleasantly surprised at how spacious the lake house was. I loved the large dining room table where we ate our meals together! The kids loved the game room and the adults loved the old record albums and telescope! The location of the house is perfect. We were just minutes from the beach at Lake Huron
tubing on the Au Sable River
the Lumberjack Monument
and dams which we visited in the afternoon

and then back to the lake house where more than one adult can easily prepared dinner in the kitchen. The yard facing the lake is beautiful and tranquil! We spent every evening there fishing and around the bon fire. The original woodwork and attention to detail in the home deserves to be mentioned as well. Very beautifully hand crafted along with square nail fixtures. It's been a long time since I've seen that! And an original Davenport glider in the sun room to boot! It took me back to my childhood! We will definately be back!
Sat Jul 16 2016 23:16:34 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Fond Memories

Thu Jul 14 2016 00:45:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Lauire Bruce
review: We had a terrific stay. We have three 2 year old grandchildren and 11 adults
and we did not need to bring a thing for entertainment. A playground even with the old merry go round
how fun is that. The house had everything you could possibly need to make our stay as wonderful as it was. Nicely decorated
very very clean
very spacious living area

great sleeping beds. Beach area was private and cleaned up daily. The property was nicely landscaped and spacious. We were there over the 4th of July and we could see fire works from any place on the grounds and on both lakes it was great. We could rent 3 types of boats if we wanted. Very accommodating
and friendly folks. We are planning to go next year once we coordinate our schedules. Loved it
Thu Jul 14 2016 00:45:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Truly a peace of heaven

Sun Jul 10 2016 02:44:31 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jenny Foster
review: We just returned from a week long stay and we were absolutely blown away by the accomadations. We had a very large group and were able to find a place for everyone. Not only was this place beautiful
clean and friendly
the access to two beaches was awesome
and it was the most kid friendly place I've ever seen! From the toys/ games provided
to the play equipment
to the kid friendly beaches
to the large fire pit great for roasting marshmallows. I live out of state
and we were able to comfortably spend quality time with family and create memories that will last forever! Thank you to the owners who were so great to work with!
Sun Jul 10 2016 02:44:31 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Above and beyond expectations!
response: It is truly a great place for all! Glad you enjoyed your stay and that you met the owners by chance
they are great! See you next year!

Sun Jul 10 2016 02:07:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Dianne Schulz
review: We were able to find the location very easily. The directions to access the keys were flawless. The first thing we noticed was a broken exterior screen door which made us think the place wasn\'t being kept up. Inside
was a pleasant kitchen
2 small bedrooms
1 bathroom
and a very large high ceiling living room
facing the water. A loft upstairs had 2 large bedrooms. Everyone missed television
we could have played DVDs
but no news. Their hand held electronics were all used. The apartment above the garage didn\'t have internet
so no one wanted to stay over there
so we had to stay there. We knew there wasn\'t cable or internet above the garage
but we assumed there would be local channels. The main house didn\'t have television either. For the cost of renting this place
the owner should easily be able to afford cable
or a satellite dish(like the next door neighbor)
after all
the weather isn\'t always beach perfect.
Sun Jul 10 2016 02:07:32 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Ist Time Renters

Tue Jul 05 2016 17:23:45 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: MStephenson
review: Summer Wind was such a perfect vacation spot! The views were so beautiful and the peacefulness of the water and waves were unbeatable! The furniture was a little uncomfortable (especially 2 of the beds) but it did not overshadow the beauty of the vacation! I think it was a great price
especially to be right on the water. From the screened in porch to the beaches
the water and the fire pit at night
it was just perfect! We will definitely be back!

review: 2016 will be the third year in a row that my family has stayed at Endless Summer property. All four of my grand kids absolutely love the beach

review: Great location

but secluded

Had a problem with the sheets on the bed but they did leave others so we could change them. Overall it was a nice stay and I would consider staying in the cottage next year.

Tue Sep 15 2015 00:20:45 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathryn
review: This location is fantastic. You are two blocks away from downtown and within walking distance to the beach. Very nice apartment with comfortable furniture and a great outdoor space. We loved the hot tub--my only complaint is it was on economy mode so it was chilly the first night we were there. We kept it on the next morning so it would heat up

but the owner turned it off so it was cool again. I'm surprised there weren't more instructions for the hot tub because there are detailed instructions for pretty much everything (including how to use the microwave). The rules and reminders seemed excessive...I was nervous I would forget to do something properly upon check out! The fire pit was also very nice to use. There is a slight slant in the floor of the apartment

but it didn't bother us. There is also a lot of space in the bedroom! It was a perfect space for two...with more people I don't think it would be as comfortable although there are couches to sleep on. Great location and great price. We would definitely stay again!
Tue Sep 15 2015 00:20:45 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Stay in the City
response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay! It is a great location
close and convenient.

management was not able to send anyone to get it working.

review: Great view of Grand Lake! Loved the ability to use the rowboat. The beds
however

were horrible! My husband who loves a firm bed - said  this bed is way too hard even for me . Air conditioner didn't cool entire unit - made sleeping on a 90 degree day a little difficult. No gas tank provided for the gas grill.
Wed Sep 09 2015 18:43:51 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great View
response: Hello! So sorry you had no propane
typically there is propane

sometimes guests forget to shut them off and the drain out. In the future so your aware you just need to call us so we can send out someone to remedy it for you as soon as possible. Grand Lake is awesome

Wed Sep 09 2015 18:40:13 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: SiRui
review: This cabin was a great place to stay. The beach is the backyard. Clean and fairly affordable. The 3 night minimum is good so you don't have to stay a whole week like some other places. However the shower was super tiny

every time I turned around I could bump into the water dial. The water took no time to get hot which is nice. There's no bathtub so if you're staying with a young child who doesn't shower yet just bear that in mind. There is one AC unit in the bedroom upstairs

to cool the rest of the house you would need to leave the door open and the ceiling fans going. I loved having a grill to cook on. The beach is clean and quiet. For an adult you can walk in the lake for a long time before it gets deep. I would certainly recommend this place and I stay here again the future.
Wed Sep 09 2015 18:40:13 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Little Cabin

Thu Sep 03 2015 19:07:29 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mary Ann Grundman
Thu Sep 03 2015 19:07:29 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We enjoyed the beach & firepit. Overall though we had a disappointing experience. Bed linens had not been changed/and or made up. WiFi not working. Washing machine not working. Perfect landing was notified & housekeeping was out next day to change linens/make beds. They also spent considerable amt of time on phone with Charter and got WiFi up & running...thank you for that. Needless to say we will not be returning.
Thu Sep 03 2015 19:07:29 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Big Waters
response: Hello
we are so sorry to hear you will not be returning Big waters is an awesome place for sure
we understand your concerns
sometimes there just isn\'t control over things that happen. Luckily in this case the wi- fi was a brand new router owner just didn\'t realize they had to register it
all was resolved the following day except for the washer repair

that just takes time. We spoke to the cleaner and we were surprised there was any issues as this was not normal at all. We were happy she was prompt in getting out to the property and we were able to offer you a discount your concerns. Hopefully you decide in the future!

Thu Sep 03 2015 18:15:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Samantha
review: We had such a great time at the Time Away cabin! Easy access
secluded out of the bustling beach cabins north. Perfect for our two dogs
they loved the big back yard. Bon fire area in back yard is nice
though due to tree cover

it's a mosquito haven. Inside cabin was cute and rustic. Pretty clean and functional. All appliances worked and we were happy with the amount of supplies provided. Brought our own linens and beds were fairly comfy. Cute living and dining area. We liked the private location and the beach access was perfect! Went swimming and dogs loved the water area. Beautiful. We will book again for next year. Exterior needs a bit of landscaping help
and the must get a new shower head but besides that
we were very satisfied. Thank you!!! :)

W'ere never leaving

review: I first have to admit that I hesitated writing a review out of fear that others may discover this incredible find and make it difficult for me to secure a reservation in the future. The first time we stayed at the Au Sable River Mist I did not write a review
well let's face it
sometimes we are caught up in the moment and think how incredible a place is only to return and discover it was okay at best. However
this being our repeat stay must admit that this will be a rental home we will visit each year we return to Oscoda. I have read many of the other comments; good and bad
and agree there could be some improvements with cleaning or updated furniture
but if every little issue was resolved
I probably could not afford to stay here. So

it really is not a factor. The icing on the cake is the staff at Perfect Landing. They have been amazing in every step of the reservation and follow-up process. They respond quickly and professionally; all the while staying friendly and caring. I want to give a shout out to one Perfect Landing Reservation Team Member in particular
Jennifer. She has gone above and beyond to help me in making my stay incredible.

Tue Sep 01 2015 20:05:08 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Robert Brewer
review: This cabin was really cozy and comfortable from the moment we entered the door. The beds were really comfortable
felt like we were still at home here. The views from the windows were amazing. We had everything we needed for cooking
and the grill was very nice too. We're already planning on next year just can't decide what dates we want to go on. Very nice cabins and location we will see you again. Bob
Tue Sep 01 2015 20:05:08 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: comfortable and relaxing

Mon Aug 31 2015 18:25:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: david
Mon Aug 31 2015 18:25:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Well where should I start I stayed at grandview 2 in august of last year and had a great experience. This year was a completely different story I booked very well in advance and showed up on my booking day about 6 pm which is already 2 hours past minimum check in. Walked up to my cabin to see clothing pillows and garbage around the inside and outside of the cabin. When I looked closer I also saw a ridiculous amount of flys and I'm not talking 2 or 3 I'm talking 20 or more flys. My fiance and I called the office which told us it should of been cleaned and the cleaning people were on there way. We sat until after 7 pm and the cleaning people finally arrived and told us how sorry they were and blamed it on the office ( perfect landings) after perfect landings told us it was the cleaning companies fault. So we decided to see what the cabin was like after they cleaned it and sat until 8:30 pm mind you we arrived at 6 pm. We walked in the cabin which to be honest had been cleaned perfectly fine except for the ridiculous amount of flys still buzzing around the cabin. I couldn't justify staying and paying over 120 dollars for a fly infested cabin so we decided to make the 4 hours drive home at 9 pm. We have been told we will be refunded and such but actually told they didn't have to refund us and normally they wouldn't truly sad when you pay good money for something and get far from what you expected. I will not be going back to the cabins and giving money to a company that put the blame on the cleaning company who then put the blame on the rental company who just plainly said well sorry we don't own the cabins nothing much we can do.
Mon Aug 31 2015 18:25:33 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: too bad they were good
response: Hello thank you for the feedback. It was simply a scheduling human error
that was remedied as soon as possible. We did try to accommodate you ASAP offered another property the following day
and offered for you to stay that night with no charge. We also understood that the previous guests left it quite a mess
so the cleaners did a great job with the time they had to assure it was ready for you. The flies however was not something anyone could fix right away. We hope you try us again
as this was something that was out of the ordinary.

Sat Aug 29 2015 03:15:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Eric Paulson

review: Spent a week here august 2015
my family had a great time. Between fishing Floyd Lake and enjoying the sandy beaches of Sand Lake I didn't stay to dry. It is really quiet considering Sand Lake is a high speed lake

but at the house you don't really hear the motors. ( and there are not alot of them) Lots of toys and books for the kids to play with along with the play structures in the pics above. good food good prices killer pie. Highly recommended.

Went to the music on Newman St on Tuesday night and Marion's twice. We loved the hammock and the outside shower. The TV and wifi were great! We will definitely plan to return.

the well stocked kitchen
the bunk beds
the fire pit
we were spellbound. The beach is Sandy. When swimming you will discover multiple sand bars on your way. Best moment was rising early
hot steamy coffee
gazing at beautiful lake Huron as the sun rose to wake the day.

review: The place is clean

we had a blast!

Fri Aug 14 2015 15:43:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jayme Gentile
review: We loved it! We were very pleasantly surprised by how nicely decorated the place was. The bed was quite comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked
everything you need for a short or long stay. They even had an iron
ironing board
and hair dryer. Bath towels were plush
shower spray is great. The air conditioners work well in keeping the place cool. Back yard is great
especially with our two little dogs. The exterior of the house is brightly decorated. The neighborhood is nice
near the lake and many local restaurants and businesses. We thought we'd miss being directly on the lake shore
but the place was so nice we didn't really mind. FYI
make sure you are able to walk up about 16 (+ or -) stairs
because they don't call it Steps in the City for nothing.
Fri Aug 14 2015 15:43:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Steps in the City

Fri Aug 14 2015 15:32:18 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jayme Gentile
review: Beautiful location! Most wonderful because it was pet friendly! The cottage is well stocked
clean sheets and towels

most everything you need in a kitchen. Wish there had been a ironing board and iron. Bring your own hair dryer and extra towels. Shower is teeny but the shower head has a decent spray. The cottages are older so they are a little dingy
but you're not there to stay inside. The location is wonderful

view of the lake is gorgeous. Remember to put everything back where you found it. We put spare sheets in a dresser drawer and were almost charged for them because the cleaning service didn't look for them. Fortunately
after a few calls to Perfect Landing Rentals
we were all squared away. Perfect Landing employees are very professional.
Fri Aug 14 2015 15:32:18 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Surf Side #13

appliances

review: This house has the most beautiful view! Perfect getaway. A few things that I wish were different - the second bedroom has beds that are only suitable for children - an adult absolutly cannot sleep on the mattress on the double bed
it is just foam. The bed in the main bedroom is a full size

very small for most couples - has no head board and there are only tv trays to use as a nightstand. Could use a little updating. We also did not have enough pillow cases or towels for our stay so would recommend bringing extras. Screens are in need of repair. Lawn needed to be cut when we were there and the garbage was full on Monday so we had a week to try to keep the critters out of someone else's garbage before trash day. Those minor issues aside
we truly enjoyed the beautiful view of the water
fires by the lake and the location of this cottage can't be beat.
Thu Aug 13 2015 16:49:06 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Moose Crossing

Thu Aug 13 2015 16:18:12 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Karen Cooper
review: I walked in this cabin and said WOW! It brought back all my memories of a cozy up north cabin with its cedar walls and ceilings. It was fully stocked with everything you could ever need. We went  unplugged  but all the amenities of tv

wifi etc were there if you wanted them. We preferred to sit in the glider rockers and listen to the waves. We got up every morning at 6 am to see the awesome sunrises. It was more beautiful and different every day. Then we went back to bed for another hour! I booked this place because I thought it would be private and wasn't disappointed. During the week

we had the beach to ourselves most of the time. It was hot weather but the ceiling fans kept us very comfortable and the temp cooled down at night Only downside was a very tight bathroom. Everything was Meticulously clean which was appreciated. Little touches everywhere p.s. could use new fry pans We certainly will plan another trip to  At Peace .

name: R
Curtis
review: This cabin was in the right vacation spot near family we were visiting. The set up outside is nice with the dock and available canoe. We enjoyed the BBQ and large deck. My family of 8 was staying in the cabin. It fit our needs for the most part. We came from out of state
so it was hard to swallow the fact that no towels are provided for 8 people (in other vacational rentals we have stayed in
if a home is to accommodate so many people they usually provide towels for that many people) There were large ants everywhere
and spider webs and spiders everywhere. For example let me share one especially harrowing experience with spiders. I had a 3 month baby and as I went to put her in her little bed we brought

I saw a large spider sitting on her blanket. In the middle of the night I had a carpenter ant crawling on my arm. I made my husband wipe down the wood paneled walls covered in spider webs. How difficult is it for the cleaning crew to wipe off the spider webs off the walls? The shower smelled moldy and had some mold in the corners. Just to note the rooms are very small and the walls are thin and have little knot sized holes in them Sound travels easily.I felt like I was camping inside our cottage. My husband thought the cottage was nice
especially since is bottom line and concern is the price. I felt creeped out
but it is slightly better than staying in a tent or trailer. It worked for our needs and things were basically minimally cleaned. I imagine it's hard to keep ants out

but I highly recommend a pest control service spray for spiders and ants because they were everywhere! (smaller ants crawled in the kitchen carpet and counters) My sister came down for a day from WI and stayed in little strip of rooms available on the same property and her room smelled like mildew and was very similar to a run down cheap hotel. This property is in such a lovely location and has such potential to be wonderful. It's such a shame that it wasn't cleaner and better maintained.
Tue Aug 11 2015 16:19:58 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Lot of potential

Tue Aug 11 2015 15:31:12 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Eric Nolan
review: We had such a great time at Eaton's Cottage! We spent the 4th of July here with three families and had plenty of room to stretch and move around. We happened to be there the same night as the full-blood-moon and witnessed the best moon-rise I've ever seen over Lake Huron. The location was perfect right on the clean beach although farther from town than I expected. I would have certainly would have given all 5 stars
but who doesn't want to pay less for better accommodations :)
Tue Aug 11 2015 15:31:12 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Landing Home

Tue Aug 11 2015 14:23:41 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sara Robb
review: My husband and I stayed here for a weekend in June over my birthday. We golfed a few places in the area and relaxed at the cottage. It was perfect! Definitely too big for just the two of us
but when we saw how nice the place was on the site and how good the price was we couldnt' pass it up. Great location
quiet
clean
and relaxing. Enjoyed a beer by the fire in the evening by the river. Would definitely go back!
title: Spacious
beautiful
and gorgeous!

Sun Jul 26 2015 22:33:07 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jennifer Doyle
review: Beautiful home
gorgeous beach and friendly neighbors! What more could you ask for? I really can't wait to go back!
Sun Jul 26 2015 22:33:07 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Endless Summer

Sat Jul 18 2015 13:41:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Diana Wojtasinski
review: This cottage is in a perfect location. It is close to the public easeway (but far enough away that you don't have to worry about small children). The public beach is within walking distance. The cottage itself was very well-stocked
clean and perfect for our family. We would definitely rent this cottage again!
Sat Jul 18 2015 13:41:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great place for family vacation!

Fri Jun 26 2015 20:17:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sue Bell
review: Our ministry group stayed at this Great Getaway and it was quiet

relaxful and the view was fantastic! There were 10 of us and we didn't get in each other's way but were able to come together in the family room upstairs for meetings. It was clean and comfortable. Will stay there again!
Fri Jun 26 2015 20:17:00 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great Getaway

Fri Jun 26 2015 15:37:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sue Bell
review: Our ministry group was originally scheduled to stay at the house in Oscoda; however
due to some scheduling problems
was moved to Enchanted Evenings. This couldn't have been better! The house was gorgeous

the scenery was unbelievable. All of us were able to have our own rooms and the Perfect Landings group (Amy) even came out to show us how to get the TV to work. The house was clean and beautifully decorated. We all had a great time!
Fri Jun 26 2015 15:37:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Enchanted Evenings
Fri Jun 26 2015 15:37:17 GMT-0400 (EDT).response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay! Hope to see you next year!

Thu Jun 25 2015 17:52:30 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Corinne Odegaard
review: We really enjoyed our long weekend at Walking on Sunshine! The house was really cute and was decorated perfectly with the beachy theme. It was also very clean. We were really happy to see that the cabin was stocked with toys and games
just in case we got rained in (which we did one day). We were also happy that the cabin had wi-fi. We spent most of our time on the beach
and this home has a nice sized beach front lot. I'd definitely stay there again. Highly recommended!
Thu Jun 25 2015 17:52:30 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Loved it!

Wed Jun 17 2015 14:25:59 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: LIsa Duman
review: My husband and I wanted to do a quick getaway for the weekend. We had our 2 pugs though and needed them to accompany us. This home was perfect for our situation. The view was beautiful. We LOVED the set up of the house. The yard was perfect for the dogs
with easy access in and out. The fireplaces are a definite bonus!! Don't need to run around trying to find things to do. Relaxing with a beautiful view of the river was all we really wanted to do!!
Wed Jun 17 2015 14:25:59 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Perfect Getaway

Thu May 14 2015 16:35:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Pam Feltch
Thu May 14 2015 16:35:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We stayed here for a weekend in early January 2015. The house was perfect for our needs. We had extended family visiting from Florida and ended up having about 9 people total. We enjoyed all of the space and double kitchens which we used to prepare for a surprise 80th birthday party. The only downside was that the downstairs fireplace didn't work. Enjoyed the experience and will be back!
Thu May 14 2015 16:35:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Winter Retreat

Thu Apr 23 2015 18:50:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sue B
review: Again
we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. It was a beautiful weekend--lots of room to spread out and not on top of each other. Great view and great upstairs living room!
Thu Apr 23 2015 18:50:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: River Mist - Ausable River-Oscoda

Tue Feb 03 2015 19:52:24 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Ann Holmes
Tue Feb 03 2015 19:52:24 GMT-0500 (EST).review: What a great rental for a large family occasion. It is spotless. There is everything you would ever need to vacation there. The location is perfect and view is outstanding. I would love to return in the summer.
Tue Feb 03 2015 19:52:24 GMT-0500 (EST).title: GREAT vacation home

Fri Dec 05 2014 17:25:08 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Trish Williams
review: The home has a great layout
good use of space

beautiful lot and the beach was awesome. The enclosed porch was nice to store beach stuff so it doesn't blow away. Needs some updates on furniture and appliances. We had a ball and were very comfortable!! Would rent again.
Fri Dec 05 2014 17:25:08 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Hurondezvous

Fri Dec 05 2014 04:58:02 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Shaye Wilcox
Fri Dec 05 2014 04:58:02 GMT-0500 (EST).review: Four girlfriends from our high school class of '69 had the best time for a long girls getaway weekend in September. The weather was perfect and the house was almost perfect. (The couch in the living room by the hot tub has to go. It was so tilted we could hardly sit on it without sliding off let alone reclining on it.) The view from all points in the living area is fantastic. We totally relaxed inside and outside.
Fri Dec 05 2014 04:58:02 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Ausable River Home

Fri Dec 05 2014 04:04:39 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Rachel M
review: We love staying here. This was our third time. It's always perfect
and we always hate leaving. We actually even got engaged here! :) We have found one of our favorite places for life.
Fri Dec 05 2014 04:04:39 GMT-0500 (EST).title: oneromlehcar@gmail.com

Fri Dec 05 2014 00:18:39 GMT-0500 (EST).name: kim
review: Very nice room
husband and I stayed for long weekend
community fire pit was great
met wonderful people. You are far enough away from town
but close if you needed to get something. Beds were very comfortble
bathrooms were nice
would highly recommend to anyone to stay here at this resort.
Fri Dec 05 2014 00:18:39 GMT-0500 (EST).title: kim

Thu Dec 04 2014 16:32:42 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Darrin Watkins
review: I have rented here twice and have had a blast both times. When we arrived late in the summer this year

the lawn was not mowed and the garbage cans were full. We called the company and they sent a guy out and cleaned everything up. Good prompt service. Not the greatest cabin but nice and cozy. We will be back.
Thu Dec 04 2014 16:32:42 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Moose Crossing

Thu Dec 04 2014 02:23:46 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Jennifer franks
Thu Dec 04 2014 02:23:46 GMT-0500 (EST).review: We stayed here two summers in a row. Loved it so much the first time that we went back a second time with extended family. We stayed in cabins 1 and 2. Both were VERY clean and well equipped. The grounds are very nice and the lake is beautiful! We rented a pontoon boat nearby that my husband was able to drive right up to the dock on the property which made for a great day for the entire family - convenient to cruise and play in the water and be able to come back to the cabin as needed. There is a sandy beach area and the water on the shoreline is clean and shallow - perfect for little kids like ours. Some nice sights to take in nearby that make for great day trips as well. We will go back again!
Thu Dec 04 2014 02:23:46 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Great place to stay!

Wed Dec 03 2014 23:02:40 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Candy
Wed Dec 03 2014 23:02:40 GMT-0500 (EST).review: This place was very clean and peaceful:) We wish they could improve the walkway to the beach and that there was more beachfront for the kids to walk and run on it was very narrow. We did enjoy everything else that this place offered and would stay again. Thanks for such a wonderful place for all of us to enjoy.
Wed Dec 03 2014 23:02:40 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Sweet Home

Wed Dec 03 2014 22:21:49 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Cassie Mendham
review: We had a great stay
the property manager was very friendly and helpful
the cottage was clean and had everything needed for a pleasant stay. Beautiful view of Lake Huron! We will surely stay again.
Wed Dec 03 2014 22:21:49 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Surf Side #13

Wed Dec 03 2014 17:49:38 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Peter Roderique
review: In six years of daddy-daughter weekends at various cabins in the Oscoda area
At Peace is the only one we've returned to more than once. We love the location on Lake Huron
the semi-private beach
and the homey touches inside. We enjoy the lake by day
and games in the evenings. If available
we will return again next year!
Wed Dec 03 2014 17:49:38 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Return Visits

Tue Dec 02 2014 22:23:06 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Maynard
review: It was great to just walk outside to fish. We stayed here in June 2014 and caught a variety of fish every time went tried. Very roomy house
great kitchen(s) and close to plenty of restaurants. Only downside was several beds were in need of newer
firmer mattresses. Would definitely visit again.
Tue Dec 02 2014 22:23:06 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Fishing Family

Mon Nov 10 2014 20:23:21 GMT-0500 (EST).name: Patti Shelton
review: Just spent the weekend there. 11/7 &11/8 and have already recommended it to others. I enjoyed the location

having my coffee in the morning looking out over the River. The 2 gas fireplacves on both ends of the home were my favorite amenity. Also having a washer/dryer available was a plus. I would recommend updating one of the televisions to a Big Screen as the current ones are a bit on the small side compared to the  theater like screen sizes we have all become accustomed to.
Mon Nov 10 2014 20:23:21 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Relaxing!

Mon Nov 03 2014 00:47:29 GMT-0500 (EST).name: David Kramer
Mon Nov 03 2014 00:47:29 GMT-0500 (EST).review: Way more than we expected! It's like being in a home away from home. I'd like to experience staying there during all the seasons. The fireplaces were a great addition and the hot tub set the place off. Very affordable! The staff at Perfect Landing were great to deal with. Don't hesitate to use this place!
Mon Nov 03 2014 00:47:29 GMT-0500 (EST).title: Cant wait to go back!

Wed Oct 22 2014 20:44:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: amy morgab
review: We stayed in the ausable river home oct 17-19. It was so nice and relaxing. we have stayed here 3 times now and it has been in every season. the cabin is spacious
cozy and very stress free. it provided us with everything we needed to make for a relaxing stay and the well needed get away we needed. the home lacks for nothing
it is decorated well
and very clean. I am thrilled it is pet friendly. my dog loves it here. the view is wonderful and the dog loves to look outside. Husband enjoyed the hot tub. I read a book
slept
we made the most of the weekend. I just lost my mother to cancer
and needed to get away for just a quick get away. Perfect landing is a joy to work with
we have rented many times over many years
the staff is accomodating in every way. I have used other property companys three times
and I will Never use anyone other than Perfect landing. you know what you are getting when you rent from them. thank you for such a wonderful home and a well needed weekend. thanks again
Amy and Doug
Wed Oct 22 2014 20:44:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: ausable river home

Sat Oct 11 2014 14:51:28 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Robert Johnstin
Sat Oct 11 2014 14:51:28 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: enjoyed a quiet and relaxing stay
Sat Oct 11 2014 14:51:28 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: quiet weekend

Tue Oct 07 2014 13:12:50 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Tim Martin
review: Our first experience with Perfect Landing

and they were helpful and courteous before and during our stay. My wife and I stayed 4 nights...PLENTY of space for the two of us. The curtainless windows all along the back of the house facing the river were a shock at first
but the view turned out to be unbelievable. Very well stocked in terms of supplies
bedding
etc. We had some small issues...one of the fireplaces didn't work
same with one of the master bedroom lights (even after I changed the bulb)
and there was an issue with the hot tub jets flicking on and off at will (we finally had to just unplug the unit). We told them not to bother coming to fix these during our stay
though I'm sure they would have. The yard was lovely and inviting
though the weather didn't really cooperate with us. All in all
the property was everything they advertised...and a little more. Would love to go back.
Tue Oct 07 2014 13:12:50 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Really Great Stay

Mon Oct 06 2014 18:36:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Rachel M
review: This was our 3rd stay here
and we absolutely adore this place. The staff at perfect landing is very nice too. We look forward to coming back every year!
Mon Oct 06 2014 18:36:27 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Best place in the world!

Sat Oct 04 2014 16:46:22 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sue TenBrink
review: Beautiful location. Dogs loved the yard. Large windows provided a wonderful view. Quiet area. Inside was a little dated
but overall I would come back in a heart beat.
Sat Oct 04 2014 16:46:22 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Relaxing spot

Tue Sep 30 2014 18:45:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Emily Pantera
Tue Sep 30 2014 18:45:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We couldn't have asked for a better fall weekend! The weather was perfect and we had a great time louging in the sun on the beach! The cabin was adorable and very cozy - no complaints from us. We enjoyed time up in Oscoda as well as down in East Tawas and can't wait to come back next summer for a full family vacation!
Tue Sep 30 2014 18:45:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Lovely Girls Weekend Getaway

Mon Sep 29 2014 23:34:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cathy Collins
review: Great location. Agree with other reviewers about musty and mildew smell. It was clean
but was in need of some general house-cleaning - screens
cobwebs around the furniture. House would be absolutely fantastic with some minor upgrades - flooring
appliances

etc. but totally understand if the house is on the market. It was not by any means a bad experience. A bit pricey as last year I rented a pet-friendly home/cottage in Pentwater Michigan right on Lake Michigan for only $250 per night (weekend getaway after Labor Day).
Mon Sep 29 2014 23:34:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Nice location but....

Mon Sep 29 2014 21:35:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Brent e Blackburn
Mon Sep 29 2014 21:35:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This was a short Birthday trip for me. My wife and our small dog really enjoyed themselves as did I. Great location on the river and so close to town. Really needed a getaway like this. Next time we will stay longer. I love to fish and will bring my boat next time. We have rented from perfect landing before and will continue to do so. I especially like the pet friendly properties which are hard to find anymore. Our little dachschund is part of the family and was in heaven. Thanks for great times and memories.
Mon Sep 29 2014 21:35:04 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Au Sable river home Sept 2014

Fri Sep 26 2014 00:54:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jodi
Fri Sep 26 2014 00:54:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: The house was a little dated for the price that you paid. But the beach made it worth it! Absolutely loved the location and beach front. Perfect Landing was great to deal with. On the last day we were there we noticed the upstairs shower was leaking into the downstairs bathroom so hopefully they got that fixed. The house had tons of movies and games for the rain day that we had. We did have a great time:)
Fri Sep 26 2014 00:54:19 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Beautiful beach

Sun Sep 21 2014 02:09:08 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cami Misiak
review: My family stayed at these beautiful cabins for a long weekend. The lawn and landscaping are beautiful
the location is perfect
the lake is clean and quiet. There is a marina right on the lake for boat rentals. The cabin was clean and just the right size for a family of five. We can't wait to return next summer!
Sun Sep 21 2014 02:09:08 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Cami

Sat Sep 20 2014 14:30:18 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Debbie
review: My husband and I enjoyed a peaceful week. The location was great
the cabin had everything we wanted. The beach and yard were perfect. There were no other people around in close proximity . We did worry that someone else would have rented the other attached cabin
this would have been difficult since they would be so close. Enjoyed the front screened in porch.
Sat Sep 20 2014 14:30:18 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Peaceful

Thu Sep 18 2014 17:17:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Cristina M.
review: My family and I stayed at #13 for an extended weekend. This cabin only shares one wall with the other motel-style cabins so it's quiet! When we checked in
everything was freshly cleaned. The only thing that was a bummer was the comfort of the fold-out bed

but hey it's a fold-out bed. One of the things that stuck out to us was when we called to report something as missing (the door chain was missing) after 5pm on a Friday we actually got a call on Saturday morning to discuss it. So

they're very attentive even on days that don't fall on business days. We look forward to renting this cabin again next year. The view of the lake is beautiful and there are fire rings as well. Oscoda is really well located so if you want to stay on the lake you can but there are scenic routes inland so easy access to Lumerman's monument or Iargo springs and the Huron National Forest. Short distance to canoe rentals if you don't own your own. Overall a really lovely place to stay!
Thu Sep 18 2014 17:17:21 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Surf-Side 13

Mon Sep 15 2014 20:03:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Deborah Stagg
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Eaton Cottage. The house was well furnished
had a lovely beach and had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. We did notice a few cobwebs in the corners in each room

so that should be addressed. We were running a little late at check out and our cleaning lady just started with the apartment above the garage. We will be going back we just enjoyed ourselves too much. We think we might have started a new tradition with the kids.
Mon Sep 15 2014 20:03:20 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Eaton Cottage

Sun Sep 14 2014 15:08:53 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Teri Schlump
review: Location of this resort is great- right on the edge of town. It's on a decent stretch of beach and a good size yard. Cleanliness is poor
much dust on furniture
filthy windows
cans and bottles in plants around deck
and spiders in bathrooms. We also found a sewing needle in the carpeting of upstairs bedroom. House is big enough
kitchen well equipped
recliners in living room need help as does bed in cottage one. View was nice. Everyone I talked to at Perfect Landings was nice and helpful.
Sun Sep 14 2014 15:08:53 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Just ok

Sun Sep 14 2014 13:57:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Joe Delegato
review: I needed some help in reserving a place to stay while attending the Tawas Bay Blues Festival. I called Perfect Landing and the staff was so helpful and spot-on when they suggessted Time Away as a place to relax
and yet be just minutes from so many fun and safe activities. The cabin was spotless and as comfortable as home. Every ammenity was there
so that we could sleep
cook
and just chill in a very private
peacful place surrounded by beautiful trees and exceptional landscape
just minutes from walking to a beautiful beach. Thanks to Perfect Landing
not only did we have a  perfect  place to stay
but their knowledge of other events and activities in the area allowed us to not only to attend the fabulous Blues Festival
but also to enjoy biking
hiking
canoeing
shopping
dining
and more. I would highly recommend Time Away
or any other property managed by Perfect Landing as their ability to meet and exceed customer satisfaction is truly remarkable!
Sun Sep 14 2014 13:57:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Thank You Perfect Landing!

Fri Sep 12 2014 13:05:51 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sandy
review: Location is walking distance to state park. There are gentler beaches (good for smaller kids)on the Tawas Bay side
and more challenging beaches (lots of sand beach
but rougher water) on the Lake Huron side. Sunrises AND sunsets! About 4 mile bike ride to town. Very traditional cottage
comfortable but not fancy. Had everything we needed supply-wise for housekeeping. Kids were happy to see speedy new wi-fi service. Only one bathroom
so cold be tricky for larger groups. We love the place
have been there 3 times.
Fri Sep 12 2014 13:05:51 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Relaxation!

Fri Sep 12 2014 10:23:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Miriam Mikulak
Fri Sep 12 2014 10:23:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: Have rented twice and enjoyed ourselves. Our grandson really loves fishing off the pier. Extremely quiet and peaceful. Toys a plenty. No need to bring. Would return.
Fri Sep 12 2014 10:23:02 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Truly a peaceful site

Fri Sep 12 2014 00:16:12 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mark Jacobs
Fri Sep 12 2014 00:16:12 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We stayed over Labor Day week. This was our second time there. We had the kids and grandkid stay the first night. There was enough room for all. It's great sitting in the hot tub and watching the sun come up over the water. Hated to leave. Cleaning crew could have done a better job. Found an old pizza in the oven. Will be back again next year!
Fri Sep 12 2014 00:16:12 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Best Place to relax!

Thu Sep 11 2014 22:49:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Ellen Mounteer
Thu Sep 11 2014 22:49:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: We had great stay at Summer Wind for our family reunion. Plenty of parking and indoor/outdoor space for times when the extended family came for a meal or a day at the beach. The excellent location made up for some of the quirkiness of the cottage. We spent about 45 minutes replacing some of the burnt-out light bulbs. There were still quite a few fixtures that don\'t have working bulbs- especially outside. Never did figure out how to get water running in the outdoor shower. Wonder if an instruction sheet about this could be provided. The toilet seat in the full bath in the main house is the wrong size/shape - awkward and uncomfortable. My biggest problem with the house was the mildew that was thick in the grout in the green tile half-bath. It really needs to be scrubbed.
Thu Sep 11 2014 22:49:24 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Summer wWnd
response: Thank you so much for your feedback with us. The light bulbs should be checked by the independent contractors that inspect the property after each stay so we will definitely check on that. We are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused and would have been happy to come out to the property and replaced them ourselves so you did not have to. Sometimes bathrooms may build up moisture and the grout just needs to be bleached and scrubbed like you mentioned. We will also touch base with House keeping on this item. Thank you for letting us know. We are happy that you enjoyed the location
beach and that there was ample parking. Thank you again and have a wonderful year! The Perfect Landing Crew!

Thu Sep 11 2014 22:31:13 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sarah Hill
review: My husband and I stayed here for three nights along with our two little kids and dog. We had a great time! The house (it's really more of a house than a cabin) is cozy
nicely decorated and extremely well-stocked. Anything you might need is in the kitchen
pantry or laundry room. The beach is beautiful and clean and a very short walk from the house. The neighborhood is small and quiet
which is great if you have little kids that want to run around

and it is a short drive to all the action in East Tawas. For those considering the Tawas area with little kids - there are sooo many playgrounds! The staff at Perfect Landing are also wonderful! They were polite
professional and responsive. I could not have asked for better customer service.
Thu Sep 11 2014 22:31:13 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Wonderful cabin!

Thu Sep 11 2014 21:18:11 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Mirjana Antic
review: Nice beach property
but too close to I-23. Furniture is old
cottage was not clean
all plastic plates and most of glasses
did not have enough spoons
forks
.. Overall
this cottage need lots of fixes. We will come back to area
but not to this cottage
unless is taken care of all things that can be fixed.
Thu Sep 11 2014 21:18:11 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Nature's Haven Review

Thu Sep 11 2014 17:25:40 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Roy Shields
review: very moderate price
close to beach but no frontage. clean and comfy for 5 people. TV with cable and everything works fine. the kitchen is very cozy
but complete. I recommend it!
Thu Sep 11 2014 17:25:40 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: nice little cottage

Mon Sep 08 2014 16:49:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Jesseca Parr
Mon Sep 08 2014 16:49:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: This is was the best place for our stay! The place was easy to find and right in downtown Tawas so we were close to everything important which was perfect. I loved the backyard area where we could sit and relax in the evening. Everything in the place was labeled so we would know where to find things which was really helpful. The only complaints I had was the sofas were not that comfortable to sleep on even with the extra cushions on them and the extra cushions were dirty from being stored on the floor in the bedroom.
Mon Sep 08 2014 16:49:48 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: AWESOME WEEK!

Wed Sep 03 2014 15:45:49 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Kathie Ramsey
review: This was our first time visiting National City and staying at a Peace of Heaven. The name fits the house and location. The house has everything you need and more. The location is amazing...access to two lakes and a short distance to Lake Huron and Tawas. It is also very quiet
if you are looking for a retreat. I would definitely recommend this rental and plan on coming back next year.
Wed Sep 03 2014 15:45:49 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Peaceful Retreat

Mon Sep 01 2014 12:36:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Judy Horning
review: Only stayed three nights
but the experience was great. Upon arrival
the house was a little musty
but after opening up the cottage
the smell went away. On a different note... I have to confirm I'm a human? That's a little odd.
Mon Sep 01 2014 12:36:38 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Excellent Stay

Sat Aug 30 2014 19:51:23 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Anna Quarress
review: Really nice

clean and comfortable place. It was one of the nicest cabins I've stayed in for such a reasonable price. Only a couple steps from the beach and perfect for relaxing vacation. Plenty of space but only 1 bathroom but the rest of accomodations were perfect. I would definitely come back here
Sat Aug 30 2014 19:51:23 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Anna's place

Fri Aug 29 2014 15:14:10 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Sheba
Fri Aug 29 2014 15:14:10 GMT-0400 (EDT).review: It is great fun for all ages. The kids loved the beach and water and the walk to the water was not long. The adults loved watching the kids in the water and the fire pit at night once the kids were sleeping. We would love to come again.
Fri Aug 29 2014 15:14:10 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Great time!!

Thu Aug 28 2014 15:35:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).name: Eric
review: We enjoyed renting this property for our young family. The cottage is well maintained. We would suggest bringing the following with you: additional towels and wash cloths for the bath and kitchen. Large trash bags (you get a TINY kitchen trash can
not suitable for a family). Food storage containers & mixing/storage bowls. The deck and patio furniture are great
it's nice to sit out there and hear the lake on this quiet street. The beach is a fair distance from the house and the lame is up high this year
so the beach was narrow and the walk was mucky
so bring water shoes or the like. Overall
the cottage was well equipped and the location was convenient. We did spend our beach time at the public beach in Oscoda
it was more suitable for our young children.
Thu Aug 28 2014 15:35:35 GMT-0400 (EDT).title: Nice Family Vacation Rental

review: Great place to get away for that up north feeling! Location is right on Lake Huron

very quiet and most of the time have the beach to ourselves. It's a pleasure to walk in the water every evening and relax with loved ones by the grill for dinner. Tiny cottage with small bathroom but the rustic and peaceful atmosphere make up for it.
